title: Block Blast!
summary:
Enter the world of Block Blast, a fun and free block puzzle game where every move challenges your brain and strategy, rewarding you with satisfying crush effects as you blast cubes away. Whether you're seeking offline relaxation or looking to enhance your logic skills, Block Blast delivers an engaging puzzle experience.

ğŸŒŸ Why You'll Love Block Blast
ğŸ”¸ Vibrant Puzzle Adventure: Match colorful blocks on an 8x8 board, solve logic puzzles, and watch the cubes crush in a cascade of color.
ğŸ”¹ Strategic Combos & Streaks:
Use your brain to clear multiple lines of blocks in one move for powerful combos. Maintain your streaks to achieve massive scores!
ğŸ”¸ Casual Yet Challenging: Play at your own pace, relax your brain, or apply deep logic strategies to beat your highest score.
ğŸ”¹ Offline Fun, No WiFi Needed: Enjoy free block puzzle game anytime and anywhere, perfect for endless fun on-the-go.

ğŸ’¥ Features of Block Blast
â— Puzzle Gameplay: Strategically place blocks and cubes, match colors, and solve each challenging level.

â— Optimized for All Devices: Smooth, seamless gameplay experience with minimal memory usageâ€”perfect for phones and tablets.

ğŸ® How to Play

âœ¨ Pro Tips for Puzzle Masters

title: Block Crush!
summary:
Welcome to Block Crush: A Free Wood Block Puzzle Game - Relax & Focus with Wood Blocksï¼

Immerse yourself in the calming pastime of Block Crush, a creative wood block puzzle game that brings a fresh, wooden twist to the classic Tetris-style gameplay. This free-to-play block crushing puzzle combines woodenized aesthetics with satisfying logic-based board challenges, perfect for fans of Tetris and similar block-stacking games. Built for stress relief, focus, and relaxation, it uses wooden bricks and minimalist design to create a serene brain teaser completely free from timers and pressure.

Clear lines through logicâ€”not luck. Every move is intentional, every solved puzzle rewarding. Whether you're looking to reset your mind or enjoy a strategic block-stacking session, Block Crush delivers a woody Tetris-like feeling that is both simple and deeply engaging. Itâ€™s the ideal choice for players who enjoy relaxing brain games, offline block puzzles, and addictive wood versions of Tetris.

ğŸ® KEY FEATURES:

â— Grainy Wood Block
Delight in the warmth and simplicity of minimalist wooden blocks in a visually soothing UI. Each wood block is designed to enhance focus and bring tactile satisfaction to your Tetris-inspired puzzle-solvingâ€”all for free.

â— Tetris-Style Block Crush Gameplay
Place wooden bricks on the 10x10 grid just like in Tetris, stack blocks to clear lines and columns, and prevent the board from filling. Easy to learn, challenging to master. Form strategies, spot patterns, and trigger satisfying blast combosâ€”all with free-form strategic thinking reminiscent of classic Tetris.

â— Relaxing Ambient Soundscape
Soft, subtle audio accompanies your every move. The sound harmonizes with the warm wood theme and enhances the rhythmic Tetris-like flow, making each line clear a gentle blast of achievement with satisfying ASMR enjoymentâ€”all completely free.

â— Fully Offline
Play this wood block puzzle anytime, anywhereâ€”no WiFi needed. Perfect for flights, commutes, or moments when you want an escape. Enjoy Tetris-inspired fun offline, totally free.

â— No Pressure, Your Pace
No timers. No penalties. No surprises. Pause and resume at will. This relaxed brick-clearing game emphasizes mindfulness and clarity over scores or speedâ€”a calming and addictive puzzle experience thatâ€™s totally free, with all the fun of Tetris and none of the stress.

â— Extra Daily Slide Puzzle for Both Adults and Kids
Slide Puzzle is an exciting bonus escape from Block Crush! Take on a new challenge every day completely free. Simply slide blocks, but plan wiselyâ€”each move rises all blocks one row, giving a fresh twist on classic block puzzle mechanics.

HOW TO PLAY:

Drag and drop organic wood blocks onto the game board

Complete full rows or columns Tetris-style to clear blocks

Plan ahead to avoid filling the board

Chain clears to trigger combo blasts and maximize scores

Ideal for players who enjoy mindful puzzles, logic games, Tetris-like challenges, and family-friendly fun. Block Crush is more than a gameâ€”itâ€™s a quiet companion for mental breaks, focused sessions, or daily relaxation, and itâ€™s completely free.

Download now and unblock the unique satisfaction of a wood block puzzle game inspired by Tetris, designed for calm, relaxation, and thoughtful engagement. Whether you're a fan of Tetris, block puzzle classics, or wooden block games, this is the perfect free brain teaser for your collection!

title: Roblox
summary:
ROBLOX â€“ PLAY, CREATE, AND EXPLORE MILLIONS OF EXPERIENCES

Thereâ€™s something for everyone on Roblox. Whether youâ€™re looking to explore, create, roleplay, compete, or hang out with friends, there's an endless amount of immersive experiences for you to discover. And even more are being made every day, all from a growing community of creators around the world.

Already have a Roblox account? Log in with your existing account and start exploring some of the most popular experiences from the Roblox community today, including Grow a Garden, Adopt Me!, Dress to Impress, SpongeBob Tower Defense, Brookhaven RP, How to Train Your Dragon, and more.

WHAT YOU CAN DO ON ROBLOX

DISCOVER ENDLESS EXPERIENCES
- Dive into adventures, role-playing games, simulators, obstacle courses, and more
- Explore trending experiences and fun, new games daily
- Compete in multiplayer battles, run your own business, or embark on epic quests

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
- Customize your avatar with your favorite clothing, accessories, and hairstyles
- Discover thousands of user-created avatar items in the Marketplace
- Express yourself with unique animations and emotes

EXPLORE TOGETHERâ€”ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
- Play on mobile, tablet, PC, console, and VR headsets
- Hang out and play with friends in multiplayer games across any device

CHAT AND PLAY WITH PEOPLE YOU KNOW
- Join a Party and jump into experiences together
- 13+ users can also chat via voice or text

CREATE, BUILD, AND SHARE
- Design games and virtual spaces using Roblox Studio on Windows or Mac
- Publish and share your experiences with millions of players

INDUSTRY-LEADING SAFETY AND CIVILITY
- Advanced content filtering and moderation
- Parental controls and account restrictions for younger players
- Clear community guidelines promoting respectful interactions
- Dedicated trust & safety teams working around the clock

WHY MILLIONS PLAY AND CREATE ON ROBLOX
- Immersive 3D multiplayer games and experiences
- Safe, inclusive environments for everyone
- A platform empowering anyone to become a creator
- New content added daily by a global community

title: Mahjong Wondersâ„¢
summary:
Relaxing mahjong match puzzle with clear tiles and gentle pace.

Enjoy a clear and relaxing mahjong match game with easy-to-read tiles and smooth controls. Simple to play and gentle in pace, itâ€™s perfect for unwinding dailyâ€”especially for older players who enjoy calm and comfortable mahjong puzzles. This soothing mahjong tile puzzle fits naturally into a quiet, everyday routine.

ğŸ€„ Classic Mahjong Match
Experience a refreshing mahjong solitaire style built around familiar mahjong match rules. Tap and match two free mahjong tiles, clear the board, and enjoy patterns inspired by classic mahjong traditions. The steady pacing makes it comfortable for all ages who appreciate soothing tile-matching games.

ğŸ® Relaxing Tile-Matching Gameplay
Each level follows the classic mahjong idea: find matching pairs, remove tiles step by step, and gradually open new paths. Clear visuals and a gentle flow make it great for anyone who prefers calm, steady puzzles. Whether for quick breaks or a relaxing daily mahjong moment, the game fits smoothly into your day.

ğŸ§© Many Boards & Helpful Tools
Play hundreds of handcrafted mahjong layoutsâ€”from simple beginner boards to more thoughtful shapes. Hints, shuffle, and undo keep your mahjong match journey smooth and stress-free, especially for players who enjoy a comfortable, low-pressure flow. Every board offers a peaceful moment built around familiar mahjong tile-matching.

Enjoy a comforting and familiar mahjong puzzle anytime.

title: Last Z: Survival Shooter
summary:
In an apocalyptic world overrun by the undead, where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance amid diminishing living spaces, will you rise as the hero we need to reshape the destiny of humankind? Uncover the adventure of Last Z: Survival Shooter â€“ your destiny awaits!

Dodge & Shoot
In the heart of the zombie-infested apocalypse, survival is not just a choice but an exhilarating stage, challenging the prowess of dodging and shooting skills. Navigate through waves of relentless undead, strategically evading their onslaught while honing your precision shooting. Each dodge and shoot propel you closer to victory, earning you abundant rewards in this thrilling game of wits and reflexes.

Explore & Expand
Brace yourself for an adrenaline-fueled journey where the apocalypse is your playground for exploration and expansion. Explore abandoned areas, uncover hidden treasures, grow from epic battles, and forge bonds with reliable companions who accompany you through thick and thin. Every step of the way brings you closer to establishing your own doomsday shelter.


Survive & Thrive
In Last Z: Survival Shooter, survival marks merely the starting point as you endeavor not just to survive but to thrive amid impending annihilation. Through exploration, expansion, and evolution, the world transforms into a vast canvas of growth and opportunity. Your prowess ascends across economic, technological, and military realms, unlocking boundless potential. And your burgeoning shelter will ultimately emerge as a beacon of hope for human civilization.

Explore, thrive, and redefine the meaning of survival in this gripping saga. Download Last Z: Survival Shooter now, plunge into the ultimate test of survival, and unveil the depths of your courage to conquer the apocalypse!

title: Royal Kingdom
summary:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

Youâ€™ll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

MASTER MATCH 3 PUZZLES
Test your skills and become the ultimate match 3 expert by solving fun yet challenging puzzles! Beat thrilling levels and overcome unique obstacles!

BUILD AND EXPLORE KINGDOMS
With the help of the Builder, craft a kingdom befitting royalty. Solve puzzles, earn coins, and unlock diverse districts - from the Parliament Square to the University and the Princess Tower.

CONQUER THE DARK KING
Defend the kingdom from the Dark Kingâ€™s attack by solving match 3 puzzles - destroy his castles and evil minions to see him fall. Victory is one match away!

EXPAND YOUR RULING
Rise through the ranks and claim the top spot on the leaderboard, master your puzzle solving skills for generous rewards, and expand your kingdom by uncovering uncharted lands as you play!

ENJOY THE FINEST VISUALS
Immerse yourself in Royal Kingdom's stunning graphics and smooth animations. A puzzle game experience like never before - captivating and seamless.

What are you waiting for? Download Royal Kingdom and join the ranks of the noble adventurers! With hours of fun, challenging gameplay, and a magical world, this puzzle game is fit for royalty!

title: Kingshot
summary:
Kingshot is an innovative idle medieval survival game that combines strategic gameplay with rich details waiting to be explored.

When a sudden rebellion overturns the fate of an entire dynasty and ignites a devastating war, countless people lose their homes. In a world riddled with societal collapse, rebel invasions, rampant disease, and mobs desperate for resources, survival is the ultimate challenge. As a governor in these turbulent times, it's up to you to lead your people through these adversities, devising internal and diplomatic strategies to rekindle the spark of civilization.

[Core Features]

Defend Against Invasions
Stay vigilant and ready to repel invasions at any moment. Your town, the last bastion of hope, depends on it. Gather resources, upgrade your defenses, and prepare for battle to ensure survival in these tough times.

Manage Human Resources
Enjoy a unique gameplay mechanic involving the allocation of survivor roles such as workers, hunters, and chefs. Monitor their health and happiness to ensure they remain productive. Respond quickly to illness to make sure everyone receives timely treatment.

Establish Laws
Codes of law are vital for sustaining civilization and are crucial for the growth and strength of your town.

[Strategic Gameplay]

Resource Struggle
Amidst the sudden state collapse, the continent is flooded with untapped resources. Refugees, rebels, and power-hungry governors are all eyeing these precious materials. Ready yourself for battle and use every strategy at your disposal to secure these resources!

Battle for Power
Compete against other players for the ultimate honor of becoming the strongest governor in this grand strategy game. Claim the throne and reign supreme!

Forge Alliances
Ease the burden of survival in this chaotic world by forming or joining alliances. Collaborate with allies to rebuild civilization!

Recruit Heroes
The game features a roster of unique heroes, each waiting to be recruited. Bringing together heroes with various talents and skills is essential for taking the initiative and ensuring safety in these desperate times.

Compete with Other Governors
Hone your heroes' skills, assemble your squads, and challenge other governors. Victory not only earns you valuable points, but also grants access to rare items. Lead your town to the top of the rankings and showcase the rise of a great civilization.

Advance Technology
With the rebellion obliterating almost all technological advancements, it's crucial to start rebuilding and reclaiming the fragments of lost tech. The race to master cutting-edge technology could determine the dominator of this new world order!

[Stay Connected]
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/5cYPN24ftf

title: Last War:Survival Game
summary:
A global zombie infestation has converted many into zombies. As a survivor, your primary goal is to retain your humanity and survive.

- Think Fast, Move Faster!
Begin your journey with an intense survival challenge. Dodge and combat waves of zombies. It's not just about survival; it's about quick reflexes and strategic thinking, as each lane presents unique obstacles and zombies!

- Create Your Zombie-Free Shelter
Customize your base and expand your army - you are the light in this shelter, leading people towards a glimmer of hope. In this strategic game, your choices in building and developing your base will shape the future of your survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

- Assemble Your Dream Team
Assemble your ultimate team by recruiting heroes. With a choice of three military branches, each hero comes with their own unique skills. Combine different heroes to easily achieve victory against the zombies.

- Unite for the Greater Good
In the challenging world of zombies, survival is a team effort. Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert â€“ alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

How long can you last in this apocalypse? Join Last War: Survival Game and embark on a thrilling journey of survival and strategy!

title: Tasty Travels: Merge Game
summary:
Tasty Travels

"Open your phone and join us on a journey around the culinary world!"
In "Tasty Travels", you get to travel the world while experiencing local cuisines, learning to make various specialty dishes, and sharing with friends from all corners of the globe! The most exciting part? You can combine two identical ingredients to create new exquisite dishes, reveling in the joy of cooking!

Unique Gameplay: Merge and Explore
Innovative Merging: Discover and merge identical ingredients during your journey, exploring new culinary secrets and enjoying the unique fun of merging!
Culinary Map: Experience over 500 types of local cuisines, each with its unique method of preparation and story!
Quest Challenges: Assist other tourists with their food requests to unlock more recipes and travel destinations!

Social Interaction and Sharing
Global Food Community: Meet friends from around the world in "Tasty Travels", share your culinary adventures, and earn their admiration!
Recipe Sharing: Exchange recipes, jointly appreciate the beauty of food, making your travel more colorful and diverse!

Travel Destinations
Unlock New Locations: Collect coins to unlock new travel destinations!
World's Famous Culinary Cities: Explore and experience dozens of the world's famous culinary cities, each with its unique flavor and culture!

title: Whiteout Survival
summary:
A global chill-out with 300 million players â€“ featuring Howie Mandel!

The blizzard has reset the world, and now, a new story awaits your touch!
As a rising survivor, gather your crew and team up with the free SSR hero Molly.
Together, you'll set out on a joyful adventure, spark the fire of hope, and rebuild a cozy home on the frozen frontier!

[Game Features]
â—†Rebuild & Restore: Easy Progress
Warmth begins with a single spark. Fire up the furnace to melt the snow and reclaim the land! Manage your people and resources to build a bustling, welcoming town!

â—†Idle & Earn: Constant Rewards
Send your heroes out with one tap, then come back to a pile of resources ready for your next big upgrade, all stress-free.

â—†Tap & Play: Instant Fun
Go ice fishing for rare catches or uncover hidden treasures beneath the snow. Perfect for quick, fun sessions anytime!

â—†Plan & Pair: Heroic Combos
All heroes share the same level, so you can upgrade and swap without the grind. Mix and match their skills for ultimate combos!

â—†Unite & Triumph: Shared Success
Join an alliance to heal faster, grow stronger, and explore further. Together, we share the chill and the cheer!

Ready to thrive in the frost? Download Whiteout Survival now â€” a perfect survival experience blending teamwork, idle fun, and smart strategy!

title: Sled Surfers
summary:
Dive into the ultimate winter adventure with Sled Surfers! Become a true snow rider as you slide through icy slopes, dodge obstacles, and race across a magical frost world filled with action. Glide on your sledge, surf the snow, and enjoy fast-paced challenges inspired by the fun, simple unpredictability.
Race through snowy trails, master tight turns, and unlock cool winter gear as you explore frozen forests, icy cliffs, and slippery downhill tracks. Whether you're chasing the thrill of a snow race or simply enjoying a relaxing winter glide, every run is packed with excitement.
And if you love the summer chaos of aqua park or waterpark slide games, youâ€™ll enjoy the same smooth, addictive flowâ€”just with a frosty twist!

ğŸ‚ Become the ultimate snow rider

ğŸŒ¨ï¸ Explore a magical frost world

title: Pixel Flow!
summary:
Conveyorâ€™s ready, pigs are on standby. Tap to send a pig onto the conveyor so it rains balls onto pixel cubes of its own color. The number above its head is its ammo: thatâ€™s how many hits it makes. Run out and it leaves the stage; if not, it slips into one of the 5 waiting slots and, when you tap again, it jumps back on the conveyor to fire another round.
The conveyor has a capacityâ€”push past the limit and youâ€™ll need to wait. Send them in the right order, manage the flow, and hit the cubes to clear the board piece by piece. Simple mechanic, sticky loop: tap â†’ flow â†’ repeat.
Highlights
One-tap control: Quick sessions, easy one-handed play.
Color matching: Pigs only hit their own colorâ€”no target-picking hassle.
Conveyor capacity: Timing and queue management add a bite-size strategy layer.
5 waiting slots: Stack, sort, and launch at the perfect moment.
Short but â€œone more roundâ€ feel: Perfect for micro-breaks.
Satisfying pixel cleanup: Every hit leaves the board feeling crisp.
For anyone who loves fast action-puzzles, timing, and flow management. The pigs are ready. The cubesâ€¦ not so much.

title: West Game II
summary:
Welcome to West Game II, where the rugged spirit of the American Frontier comes to life in your quest to build a thriving town amid the chaos of the Wild West. As the leader of an emerging settlement in post-Civil War America, you will rescue townsfolk, build a formidable gang, and carve your name into the annals of Western history.

In 1865, the Civil War had ended, but the struggle for survival in the lawless West had just begun. Dreamers and fortune-seekers flood the Frontier, each fighting for their share of glory and gold. In this ruthless land where deception and betrayal are common currency, your leadership and strategic prowess will determine whether your town flourishes or falls.

West Game II is a game of ambition, strategy, and cunning. Every decision shapes your town's destiny and your reputation in the Wild West. Will you focus on developing a prosperous economy through your loyal townsfolk, or will you build an unstoppable force of outlaws and gunslingers? The frontier awaits your commandâ€”do you have what it takes to become a legend of the West?

GAME FEATURES

Rescue and Take in Townsfolk:Â Defeat Rebels and rescue refugees throughout the dangerous frontier. Convert these grateful survivors into loyal Townsfolk who will help your settlement grow and prosper.

Dynamic Town Building:Â Construct and upgrade a variety of Western buildings to create a thriving frontier settlement that reflects your vision of the ideal Western community.

Recruit Powerful Heroes:Â Recruit infamous Heroes and Outlaws to fight under your banner. Promote and equip them with legendary equipment to create an unstoppable force.

Epic Real-Time Battles:Â Lead your Sheriff and Heroes into battle against rebels, rival players, and anyone who dares challenge your authority. Experience the thrill of combat as you expand your territory across the Wild West.

Forge Formidable Alliances:Â Team up with other players to create powerful coalitions. Share resources, coordinate attacks, and defend each other's territories against common enemies.

title: Vita Mahjong
summary:
Vita Mahjong is an Exclusive Puzzle Game of Tile Matching. We are thrilled to present the mahjong game that combines innovation with classic gameplay. It offers large tiles and a user-friendly interface compatible with pads and phones. Our goal is to provide a relaxing yet mentally engaging gaming experience, particularly focused on older adults.

At Vita Studio, we have always been dedicated to crafting mobile games designed for seniors that bring back relaxation, fun, and joy. Our repertoire includes popular titles like Vita Color, Vita Jigsaw, Vita Word Search, Vita Block, Vita Sudoku, and more.

How to Play Vita Mahjong:
Playing free Vita Mahjong game is simple. Just aim to clear all the tiles on the board by matching tiles with identical images. Tap or slide two matching tiles, and they will vanish from the board. Your objective is to match tiles that are not concealed or blocked. Once all tiles are eliminated, it signifies successful completion of a majong game!

Exclusive Vita Mahjong Game Features:
â€¢ Classic Mahjong : Staying true to the original gameplay, it presents traditional card tile sets and hundreds of boards.
â€¢ Special Innovations: Besides the classic, our game introduces special tiles that add a fresh twist to the classic mahjong.
â€¢ Large-Scale Design: Our mahjong games feature large, easily readable text sizes to alleviate the strain caused by small fonts.
â€¢ Active Mind Levels: A special mode designed to sharpen your mind and improve memory abilities in the mahjong games.
â€¢ Customizable Scoring: You can enjoy free classic mahjong games without a timer and any score pressure.
â€¢ Super Combo: When you consecutively match mahjong tiles during the game, you will unlock special experiences.
â€¢ Helpful Hints: Our game provides free useful props, such as hints, undo, and shuffle, to help players overcome challenging puzzles.
â€¢ Daily Challenge: Take on daily practice to collect trophies and improve your classic mahjong solitaire game skills.
â€¢ Offline Mode: Full offline support lets you enjoy Vita Mahjong anytime, anywhere, without needing internet.
â€¢ Multi-device: Optimized for pad and phone, ensuring everyone can enjoy the classic mahjong game.

Vita Mahjong is a versatile game made for those who love tile matching games. Download Vita Mahjong and start your mahjong dynasty now!

Note: This is a puzzle game in the style of Mahjong Solitaire. It does not contain the rules of traditional Mahjong or other types of solitaire or card games. The term â€œMahjongâ€ here refers solely to the visual style of the tiles.

Contact us via: support@vitastudio.ai
For more information, you can:

Visit our official website: www.vitamahjong.com

title: Wizardry Variants Daphne
summary:
Wizardry Variants Daphne carries on the lineage of the classic RPG series, Wizardry. The portal to the labyrinth of despair, where even destruction is pleasure, has opened once again.

â–  Story
Once every 100 years, the Abyss opens.

It is a curse of death that consumes the continent. A Warlock who coveted Death, devoured people and animals and enveloped the world in despair.

Inheriting the power to seal the Abyss over generations, kings have continued to protect the kingdom from its curse.

But now, the king has vanished, and the world is being consumed by death, moment by moment.

Resistance itself is meaningless.
There is naught but to perish.

Experience an adventure of your very own with unique allies based on combinations of classes and races.

â– What is Wizardry?
Wizardry is a computer role-playing game released in the United States in 1981 with elements such as party organizing, labyrinth exploration, monster fighting, and character development having such a tremendous impact on the various RPGs that followed, that it is often referred to as the origin of RPGs. Numerous sequels have been released, and nearly 40 years after its release, it remains a timeless masterpiece that enjoys strong popularity around the world.

title: Fate War
summary:

[Sugar Coating]
Once you've filled up your skewer, pop them in the pot and give a gentle stir to give a delicious sugary glaze. Create a thin and crunchy Tanghulu with the master's secret technique!

[Mukbang Live Stream]
Yet another crunchy live stream success! Yum! The chat was buzzing today. Now it's time to stock up on fresh ingredients with the Super Chats I earned by completing viewer missions!

Are you ready? It's time to challenge the Tanghulu master!

Contact: support@whoyaho.com

title: Doomsday Ã— Attack on Titan
summary:
The epic Attack on Titan collaboration has arrived! Team up with Eren and step through the rift in time to face a new set of trials in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront the threat of massive mutants head-on! Overcome ultimate challenges to unlock exclusive new Heroes and Shelter Skins, plus claim a ton of collaboration rewards. Commander, the truth about this world awaits you. Join the fight now and make this battlefield your own!

Doomsday: Last Survivors is a zombie survival game with multiplayer online competition and real-time strategy elements. Set in a near future where zombies have taken over the world, survivors must fight for their lives and humanity's future. As the Commander, you must lead fellow survivors to build their Shelter, explore fog-filled areas, and fight the zombies and rival factions! Are you tired of the usual strategy games and love zombie games? Check out Doomsday: Last Survivors to experience the exciting survival game!

[Game Highlights]

New Tower Defense Gameplay
Find new ways to beat your enemies in one of the coolest strategy games! Skilled survivors will join you to explore this fallen world oozing with the infected. Stay sharp, set up ideal Hero formations, and construct fortifications to survive the zombie invasion!

Survival of the Fittest
Lead troops and civilians in your Shelter! Exterminate zombies to survive the apocalypse, or raid other Shelters to sustain your own. You can also form an alliance and fight enemies with your allies in one of the best survival games!

A Realistic Doomsday Experience
The crisis continues to loom over us in a cruel world where it's kill or be killed. Want to experience one of the best immersive survival experiences in zombie games? Look no further! Check out the realistic spherical terrain system with convenient zoom controls that enable close-up Shelter views to satellite views. Download Doomsday: Last Survivors today!

Strategic Battles
Become the best at survival games by utilizing everything you can find. Train multiple troop types and execute diverse battle strategies with Hero skills and attacks to outlast the zombie hordes.

Unique Heroes
Realistic and exciting Hero designs portray survivors from different walks of life. Recruit talented Heroes to help lead your troops, defend your Shelter, and beat one of the best strategy games!

Commander, are you ready to survive the apocalypse?
Become the best at zombie games with your strength and wits!

===Information===
Official TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@doomsdaylastsurvivor
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/DoomsdayLastSurvivors
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/doomsdaylastsurvivors
Customer Support: help.doomsday.android@igg.com

title: RummikubÂ®
summary:
The original Rummikub FREE version (not Rummy nor Rummy Cube or Okey) is one of the most popular family games in the world.
The unique combination of tactical thinking, luck and tense competition has made this classic family game to one of the most successful games for the past 70 years! Arrange the tiles to create the smartest color and numbers combinations.
Will you be the first player to place all tiles and win the match?

* The original Rummikub is now available on Google Play for FREE!
* Play the classic Rummikub game online with your friends, family or players from all around the World.
* You can choose to connect with your Facebook account, email or as a guest.
* Collect a daily bonus and get rewarded for coming back everyday.

PLAY NOW
Play ONLINE with millions of Rummikub players from all around the world and try to win as many points as you can to become the Rummikub Master!

CUSTOM GAME
CREATE a public table with your own settings preferences.

PRIVATE GAME
INVITE FRIENDS and family members to play!
Create private tables and choose your own personal game settings.
You can see which of your friends are online from your Facebook's friendlist and invite them to join you to play a fun classic Rummikub game.
We offer 7 types of tables.

PRACTICE GAME
Play against computer players (also available OFFLINE). Define the turn time, opponents number and difficulty level.

Includes 10 supported languages - English, German, French, Dutch, Korean, Chinese, Spanish, Polish, Turkish and Portuguese.

Experienced a problem? Got a suggestion? You can reach us at support@rummikub-apps.com

title: 1945 Air Force: Airplane Games
summary:
1945 Air Force: Airplane Games â€“ Dominate the Skies in Epic Battles!

ğŸš€ Take control of legendary warplanes and experience the thrill of airplane shooting games in 1945 Air Force! This classic arcade game brings intense air force battles, fast-paced shooting action, and adrenaline-packed flying games straight to your mobile device. Join the ultimate air force challenge, relive the spirit of 1945, and become a true wing fighter ace!

ğŸ”¥ THE ULTIMATE AIR COMBAT EXPERIENCE
Step into the cockpit of legendary WW2 fighter jets and take part in epic aerial dogfights. This game delivers thrilling plane-shooter action. Battle enemy squadrons, dodge bullets, and destroy powerful bosses to rule the skies!

âœˆï¸ KEY FEATURES
ğŸ”¥ Over 30 legendary WWII battle zones
ğŸ”¥ More than 900 action-packed campaigns
ğŸ”¥ Over 60 warplanes, including fighter jets, bombers, and stealth aircraft
ğŸ”¥ Classic arcade-style shooting gameplay with modern graphics and smooth controls
ğŸ”¥ Upgrade & customize your warplanes to dominate every battle
ğŸ”¥ Exciting game modes: PvP dogfights, Boss Battles, Stealth Missions & more
ğŸ”¥ Daily rewards & challenges for extra excitement
ğŸ”¥ Clan system: Form a squadron, team up, and take on global challenges
ğŸ”¥ Online & offline gameplay â€“ battle anytime, anywhere!

ğŸ›©ï¸ COMMAND THE MOST POWERFUL WARPLANES
Fly historical WW2 aircraft from the United States of America, South Korea, Japan, Germany, Great Britain, and the USSR.
From the famous P-51 Mustang, Spitfire, and B-17 Flying Fortress to the Mitsubishi A6M Zero â€” plus modern aircraft such as the KF-X and KAI T-50 Golden Eagle from South Korea.
Upgrade your jets with powerful weapons, shields, and boosters to dominate your enemies!

title: Where Winds Meet
summary:
Where Winds Meet is an epic open-world action-adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

An Era on the Brink. A Hero on the Rise
Explore China's Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, where political intrigue, power struggles, and epic battles shape the course of history. From the bustling heart of the imperial capital to the hidden corners of forgotten wilderness, every path is layered with secrets, sights, and stories waiting to be discovered.

Who are you â€” a hero, or an agent of chaos?

Here, freedom is yours, but every action has its weight. Cause chaos, defy the law, and face bounties, pursuit, even time behind bars. Or walk a nobler path: befriend villagers, forge alliances, and grow your reputation as a hero of the Wuxia world. In a world torn by chaos, become the spark that ignites change and forge your legacy!

An Open World of Infinite Possibilities
From bustling cities to forgotten temples hidden deep within emerald forests, the world flows with lifeâ€”changing with time, weather, and your actions.

Traverse vast landscapes in Wuxia style: scale rooftops with fluid parkour, ride the windstride across miles in moments, or use fast travel points to leap between regions.

Uncover thousands of points of interests, discover over 20 distinct regions, interact with diverse characters, and engage with numerous authentic activities in a world that teems with life. Explore ancient cities, reveal forbidden tombs, play flutes beneath swaying willows, or drink under lantern-lit skies.

Master Your Way of Wuxia Combat
Build your fighting style to match your rhythmâ€”whether you thrive in the heart of melee, strike from afar, or move unseen in the shadows. Choose how you engage, and build a loadout that supports your playstyle.

Take control of fluid, responsive martial arts combat built around classic wuxia weaponry, skills, and strategy. Wield weapons both familiar and legendaryâ€”sword, spear, dual blades, glaive, fan and umbrella. Switch between weapons, bows, and mystic martial arts like Taichi to outmaneuver your enemies.

Create and customize your character and progression, choose your role in a fractured world. Align with powerful factions, explore distinct professions, and forge your identity through your actions.

Adventure Alone or Forge Your Community
Embark on a rich, narrative-driven adventure with over 150 hours of solo gameplay, or open your world to up to 4 friends in seamless co-op.

Build or join a Guild to unlock a wide range of group activitiesâ€”from intense guild wars to challenging multiplayer dungeons and epic raids.

Prove your might in competitive duels, or step into a shared, ever-evolving world with thousands of fellow adventurers.

Build houses, factories, and community buildings, grow crops on your farm, and decorate your town just the way you like. Take part in limited-time events, compete in exciting regattas, and earn exclusive prizes!

Need a break from city planning? Jump into relaxing match-3 puzzles to earn rewards, speed up your progress, and unlock even more fun â€” all available offline!
Township â€” the perfect blend of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!

GAME FEATURES:
â— Unlimited creativity: Design and build the metropolis of your dreams!
â— Engaging match-3 puzzles: Complete fun levels to earn rewards and boost your progress!
â— Exciting competitions: Test your skills against players from around the world in regular competitions â€” win prizes and make unforgettable memories!
â— Exclusive collections: Gather valuable artifacts, rare antiquities, and colorful profile pictures to showcase your achievements!
â— Offline play: Enjoy Township anytime, anywhere â€” even without an internet connection!
â— Vibrant community: Meet friendly characters with unique personalities!
â— Social connections: Play with your Facebook friends or make new friends in the Township community!

Why You'll Love Township:
â— A unique mix of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!
â— Stunning graphics and charming animations
â— Regular updates with fresh content and special events
â— Personalize your town with a wide variety of decorations

Township is free to play, but some in-game items can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.

title: Among Us
summary:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-15 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.

title: Epic Plane Evolution
summary:
Launch, Upgrade, and Conquer the Skies with your plane!

Prepare for an exhilarating aerial adventure in Epic Plane Evolution, where your piloting skills and strategic upgrades determine how far your aircraft can soar. Launch your plane, navigate through diverse terrains, and evolve your aircraft to achieve maximum distance. Whether you're a casual gamer or a flight enthusiast, this game offers a captivating blend of action and strategy.

Epic Plane Evolution is a physics-based flight game that challenges players to launch their aircraft using a slingshot mechanism and guide it through various environments. As you progress, collect coins to upgrade your plane's components, enhancing its performance and unlocking new flight capabilities. Each level introduces unique challenges, requiring precise timing and strategic upgrades to succeed.

ğŸ¯ Slingshot Launch Mechanics
Initiate each flight by pulling back your plane on a slingshot, determining the initial speed and angle. Mastering this mechanic is crucial for achieving optimal flight paths and distances.

ğŸš€ Aircraft Evolution and Upgrades
Accumulate coins during flights to invest in upgrades such as wings, engines, and fuselage enhancements. These improvements not only boost your plane's performance but also unlock new visual designs and capabilities.

ğŸŒ Diverse Environments
Navigate through a variety of terrains, each presenting unique obstacles and weather conditions. Adapt your flight strategy to overcome challenges like wind currents, mountainous regions, and urban landscapes.

ğŸ§­ Strategic Flight Control
While airborne, adjust your plane's pitch and angle to maintain momentum and avoid obstacles. Strategic in-flight decisions can significantly impact your flight distance and coin collection.

ğŸ’° Rewarding Progression System
Earn coins based on the distance traveled and successful navigation through obstacles. Use these earnings to continuously upgrade your aircraft, pushing the boundaries of how far you can fly.

ğŸ Daily Challenges and Rewards
Engage in daily missions that offer additional rewards, encouraging consistent play and providing opportunities to test new strategies and upgrades.

title: Tile Match puzzle - Tiletopia
summary:
Introducing "Tile Match" â€“ the captivating tile-matching puzzle game that will immerse you in a world of triple tile-tapping challenges and brain-teasing fun.


Get ready to embark on an exciting journey through intricate puzzles as you match tiles, clear boards, and become the ultimate tile master.

With its friendly mechanics and addictive gameplay, Tile Match is the perfect choice for tile-matching enthusiasts who crave a delightful puzzle gaming experience.

In Tile Match, your objective is simple yet engaging: match three or more tiles to clear them from the board. What starts as a straightforward game quickly evolves into a thrilling mental workout as you progress through increasingly intricate levels. The game takes inspiration from classic Mahjong puzzles and elevates them with modern graphics and a touch of innovation, making Tile Match a classic matching game for players of all ages.
Key Features of Tile Match:

1. Addictive Matching Gameplay: Dive into the world of triple tile matching with easy-to-learn mechanics that quickly become addictive. The more you play, the more challenging it gets, ensuring you're always engaged.

2. Beautifully Crafted 3D Tiles: Tile Match boasts stunning 3D tiles that not only enhance the visual appeal but also provide a delightful sensory experience as you tap tiles and match your way through the game.

3. Brain-Teasing Challenges: Each level in Tile Match presents a new and exciting puzzle to solve. It's not just about matching tiles; it's about strategy and skill as you navigate through brain-teasers that will keep you on your toes.

4. Unlock Scenic Landscapes: Traverse a mesmerizing game world filled with scenic landscapes and interesting tiles as you progress through the levels. From serene seascapes to lush rainforests, Tile Match offers a visually diverse gaming experience.

5. Endless Entertainment: With thousands of challenging puzzles, brainteasers, and classic tile-matching games at your fingertips, you'll never run out of opportunities to test your tile-matching prowess.

6. Regular Game Updates: Stay excited and engaged with Tile Match, as new levels are added regularly to keep the gameplay fresh and invigorating.

7. Master the Art of Matching: Clear the tile game board by matching three tiles and unlock new triple tile match chapters, each with its unique set of challenges and scenic backdrops.

8. For Gamers of All Levels: Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a relaxing pastime or a hardcore enthusiast seeking a formidable challenge, Tile Match caters to a wide range of players.

In conclusion, Tile Match is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the thrill of triple tile-matching puzzles. With its beautiful 3D tiles, regular updates, and a vast array of brain-teasing levels, it promises hours of entertainment.

Download Tile Match today and embark on a journey to become the ultimate tile master. Tap, match, and conquer the world of tiles in this exciting puzzle adventure!

title: TFT: Teamfight Tactics
summary:
Put your team-building skills to the test in Teamfight Tactics, the multiplayer PvP auto battler from the studio behind League of Legends.

Bust out the big-brain strats as you draft, position, and fight your way to victory in an 8-way free-for-all battle. With hundreds of team combinations and an ever-evolving meta, any strategy goesâ€”but only one can win.

Master turn-based strategy and arena combat in epic auto battles. Queue up across a variety of chess-like social and competitive multiplayer modes, then outsmart and outlast your enemies to take your place at the top!

LORE & LEGENDS
Somewhere in the Convergence, a magical library holds a record of every moment that has shaped Runeterraâ€”and by discovering it, you have reawakened all the champions and conflicts within. Itâ€™s up to you to bring Runeterraâ€™s most iconic legends back to life!

Whether you rekindle past rivalries or honor old alliances, Lore & Legends features the largest roster of recruitable champions (100!) in any TFT set to date. And only you can decide whether things will play out true-to-history or reach other epic conclusionsâ€¦

While 60 champions are ready for the arena right from the start, you can only discover the remaining 40 Unlockable champions through in-game quests that tell their story. So get questing!

REPLAY LEGENDARY BATTLES
Draft a team of champions from a shared multiplayer pool.
Battle it out round by round to be the last Tactician standing.
Random drafts and in-game events mean no two matches play out exactly the same, so use your creativity and cunning to summon a winning strategy.

PICK UP AND GO
Challenge your friends and destroy your foes in turn-based battles across PC, Mac, and mobile.
Queue up together and find out if you and your friends have what it takes to come out on top.

RISE UP THE RANKS
Full competitive support and PvP matchmaking means there are countless ways to outplay your opponents.
From Iron to Challenger, auto battle your way up the ladder based on your final standing in every game.
A top-tier strategy might even earn you exclusive Ranked rewards at the end of every set!

REP YOUR REGION
Dive into battle with your favorite Chibi Champion or Little Legend!
Collect new looks just by playing games, or by purchasing them in the TFT store.

EARN AS YOU PLAY
Collect free loot with the Lore & Legends Pass, or upgrade to Pass+ to unlock even more rewards! Battle like the Ascended across the Shuriman Overlook Arena, crush your opponents with iron and fury using the Noxian Battering Ram, or raise anchor and take them down with the Set Sail boom.

Download and play Teamfight Tactics today!

title: Pocket Sort: Coin Merge Puzzle
summary:
SORT YOUR WAY TO HAPPINESS ğŸ˜ƒ

Master mergers, ready those fingers and get to matching in 3â€¦2â€¦1! This fun sorting puzzle features colorful coins that need to be matched up in their slots and then merged together to clear the playing field, making way for more. Bright colors, simple graphics, and lots of boosters ensure that your brain can focus on what it does best: noticing patterns and finding unique ways to shuffle everything around in order to win.

MASTER THE MATCH ğŸ§©

Simple in theory yet difficult in practice, players young and old will enjoy racking their brains for the best possible way to merge the different color coins and keep progressing. With no timer or pressure to trip you up, youâ€™ll be able to sort, match, and merge the coins while also relaxing.

Fun features:

ğŸ¤‘ Tons of coin types â€“ In addition to your standard rainbow of coins to match, as you progress there will be all manner or fun new coins to keep things fresh. Hidden coins, linked coins, ice coins, and more await, so keep your eyes peeled!

ğŸ¤” Easy on the eye â€“ As colorful as this sorting puzzle is, the whole point is to help you chill so weâ€™ve done away with any crazy graphics or flashing lights. This also means the game is great to play wherever you find yourself, solo or perhaps with a little helper.

ğŸ’†â€â™‚ï¸ Relaxing to play â€“ No countdown clock here! Take as much time on each puzzle as you need, and move the coins around as much as you want without being penalized. We believe in having fun, not getting stressed.

GO ON A COLORFUL ADVENTURE â›°ï¸

title: Dinosaur Universe
summary:
Embark on an Epic Journey in Dino Universe: A Jurassic RPG Adventure!

Immerse yourself in the prehistoric wonders of the Jurassic world as you lead your pack of raptors in thrilling battles against formidable foes. Dinosaur Universe combines the excitement of dinosaur encounters with the action of RPG gameplay, delivering an addictive idle gaming experience unlike any other.

As the last remaining raptor leader, it's up to you to fend off the menacing Tyrannosaurus and its minions. Hatch eggs to recruit powerful companions and evolve them into fearsome allies capable of taking on even the fiercest adversaries.

Key Features

â–  Jurassic RPG Battles
Engage in thrilling encounters where every bite and scratch counts. Gather resources, strengthen your pack, and conquer the dino world. Experience the ultimate dinosaur battles in the Jurassic park setting, where every battle enhances your RPG adventure.

â–  Egg Hatching and Evolution
Discover hidden eggs scattered throughout the land and unlock a diverse array of dinosaurs to join your squad. Evolve your companions to unleash their full potential in battle. Each dinosaur in your park adds to the strategic depth of your Jurassic RPG battles.

â–  Upgrade and Customize
Enhance your raptors' abilities through endless upgrades and evolution paths. Dominate the battlefield with your unstoppable force of genetically modified and mechanical dinosaurs. Upgrading your dinosaurs is crucial to surviving in the competitive world of Jurassic park battles.

â–  Idle RPG Mechanics
Enjoy the convenience of automatic battles and idle progression, allowing you to effortlessly expand your territory and strengthen your pack. The idle RPG system ensures your dinosaur team grows stronger easily.

â–  Explore Endless Possibilities
Dive into a world teeming with adventure and mystery. Uncover the secrets of the dinosaur world as you encounter various species and face off against formidable enemies. The Jurassic park is full of challenges and rewards for those who explore it fully.

â–  Easy and Free to Play
Experience the thrill of dinosaur battles without any barriers. Dinosaur Universe is free to download and play, offering hours of entertainment with no internet connection required. Lead your raptor squad and enjoy the Jurassic RPG adventure anytime, anywhere.

Download Dinosaur Universe now and unleash the power of your raptor squad in the ultimate Jurassic RPG adventure!
Explore the dino world, engage in epic battles, and upgrade your park to become the mightiest dinosaur leader!

title: KartRider Rush+
summary:
The kart racing sensation enjoyed by over 300M players worldwide is back and better than ever with more style, more game modes, more thrill! Race with friends or just play it solo through a variety of gameplay modes. Collect and upgrade iconic characters and karts from the KartRider universe. Climb the leaderboard ranks and become the ultimate racing legend!

â–¶ A Heroic Tale Unfolds!
The stories behind what drives the Racers are finally brought to light! Experience an immersive story mode unique to the KartRider franchise that introduces you to the various gameplay modes!

â–¶ Master the Modes
Whether itâ€™s chasing glory as a lone racer or rising to the top of the leaderboards as a team, itâ€™s you who will decide your own path. Select from a variety of gameplay modes that will pave your way to victory.
Speed Race: Earn licenses that unlock more challenging race tracks as you progress and rely on pure drifting skills to reach the finish line
Arcade Mode: Choose from a selection of gameplay modes such as Item Race, Infini-Boost, or Lucci Runner that add an extra layer of fast-paced thrill to your races
Ranked Mode: From Bronze to Living Legend, climb up the Racing Tiers and earn respect among your peers
Story Mode: Join Dao and friends and help them stop the treacherous Pirate Captain Lodumaniâ€™s evil deeds
Time Trial: Beat the clock and make your mark as the fastest racer

â–¶ Drift in Style
Kart racing has never looked so good! Style your Racer in the latest outfits and accessories and go BOLD with a selection of stylish and iconic Karts. Adorn your ride with trendy decals and pets that will earn you prestige on the tracks.

â–¶ Become a Racing Legend
Take the wheel and show your rivals what true speed is all about though competitive multiplayer matches in real-time. Leverage the drifting controls optimized for mobile, time your Nitro boosts to make for the perfect drift, and leave your opponents in the dust!

â–¶ Join the Club
Join forces with players from around the world and complete quests together as a Club. Show off your latest kart through your own private customizable Home or cool off from a hard-earned match with fun, quick mini-games.

â–¶ Race Tracks on Another Level
Accelerate to the finish line through over 45+ race tracks! Whether youâ€™re taking a tour through the bustling traffic in London Nights, or enduring the biting chill of the ice in Sharkâ€™s Tomb, every track has their own distinctive traits that offer a different racing experience for players looking for a challenge.

title: Bus Escape: Traffic Jam
summary:

How to play:
- Tap to move cars, each car go in only 1 direction
- Plan your moves carefully as the parking slot is limited
- Guide the buses out of the gridlocked bus out jam.
- Each type of car can carry 4 - 6 8 stickmen, so strategize your moves to tackle challenging sort puzzles.
- Ensure every passenger gets to their matching buses
- Stuck in jam? Power up a booster to secure a victory with ease

Game Feature:

organizational skills

title: Master of Gomoku
summary:
Welcome to play our Gomoku game! As a popular board game, Gomoku not only helps improve your thinking and logical skills, but also provides a relaxing and stress-relieving experience.

Our Gomoku game features:

Easy to learn, suitable for players of all ages. With multiple difficulty levels, you can find a challenge that fits your skill level, whether you are a beginner or an expert.
Supports both single and multiplayer modes. You can play with friends or challenge our powerful AI engine for a real test.
Beautiful and simple interface allows you to focus on the game. We also provide multiple chess pieces and board skins for you to customize your experience, including different board sizes and rules.
Multi-language support allows you to play in your native language from anywhere in the world. We strive to make our game global.
Download our Gomoku game, challenge your friends or AI opponents, and exercise your intelligence and skills. We also welcome your feedback and suggestions to help us improve our game.

title: Haunted Merge: Horror Story
summary:
"You don't see them... but they see you.

Youâ€™re an orphan, raised by a wandering feng shui master who found you near a graveyard. Before he died, he handed you a locked boxâ€”the only clue to your past. After burying him, you begin your journey to uncover the truth.
Your first lead brings you to a run-down apartment building. You move in as a tenantâ€”but something is deeply wrong.
- The elevator opens by itselfâ€”on floors no one pressed.
- An empty unit echoes with whispers that donâ€™t exist.
- A cursed construction site keeps taking lives...
What starts as a ghost story becomes something far more disturbing.
Because sometimes, the real horror isnâ€™t the ghostâ€”itâ€™s the people.

Game Features:
Face your fears and uncover long-buried secrets
Merge clues to reveal hidden truths
Look closely - every detail could crack the case
Solve puzzles and relax through a hauntingly original experience

Dare to look deeper?
Your parents are gone. But why?
Is it a curseâ€¦ or a cover-up?
Can you tell whatâ€™s real - and whatâ€™s a setup?
The deaths keep coming. Accidents? Or something worse?

Perfect for players who:
Love creepy folktales and chilling mysteries
Enjoy merge mechanics with a twist
Are drawn to stories about the dark side of human nature
This is your only way out.

Download Haunted Merge: Horror Story
Merge the evidence. Uncover the truth.
Expose the terrifying secrets buried behind every story they tried to erase."

title: Watermelon Maker 2048
summary:
Dive into the exciting and exciting world of fruit merging!
Merge the same fruits to make a bigger fruit.

If the fruit overflows the container, it's game over!
Be careful! The more fruits you merge, the bigger they become and can overflow the container.
You can compete with users from all over the world and compete for rankings through the multiplayer battle mode!

[How to play]
Aim to where you want the fruit to drop.
Merge fruits of the same stage to make a bigger fruit.
The more fruits you merge, the higher your score.
Merge watermelons in the final stage to make them disappear with additional scores.

[Features]
- Play anywhere with one hand.
- Play offline.
- Easy to operate and simple rules
- Play multiplayer battles with users from all over the world.
- Compete for rankings with users from all over the world every week!
- Collect various skins.
- Supports tablet play.

[Various Skins]
- You can change each of the 11 skins.
- If you merge sweet fruits, it becomes a watermelon.
- If you merge cute animals, it becomes an elephant.
- If you merge large planets, it becomes the sun.
- If you merge delicious foods, it becomes a pizza.
- If you collect skins, you can receive special rewards.
- Unlike other merge puzzle games, it is a game that anyone can easily enjoy!
- Start the fruit merge game that is popular around the world now!

Solve puzzles, restore the interior room by room, and meet new friends in every chapter of the exciting storyline. Austin the butler is ready to welcome you to a world of incredible adventures!

Game features:
â— Original gameplay: make match-3 combinations and decorate your house while enjoying an exciting story!
â— Thousands of captivating levels with explosive power-ups, useful boosters, and cool elements.

Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Homescapes is free to play, but some in-game elements (including randomized items) can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.

title: Wool Crushâ„¢ - Yarn Color Sort
summary:
Wool Crush â€“ Logic Color Sort Puzzle Master

Sharpen your mind and test your logic in Wool Crush - 3D Wool Sort, a color sort puzzle game designed for relaxing yet strategic play.
Solve each yarn sort puzzle step by step, match colors with precision, and complete challenging wool sort levels that blend car jam logic and creativity.

ğŸ§© Solve Logic Challenges and Clear Every Puzzle
- Each level in Wool Crush - Car Jam Logic is a handcrafted color sort puzzle with a clear objective: match all wool sort colors in the correct order.
- Think ahead, plan your moves, and use your brain to complete every yarn sort stage efficiently.
- Itâ€™s easy to start, fun to play, and deeply satisfying to master!
- Progress through hundreds of 3D color sort puzzles and discover new yarn sort mechanics as you play.

ğŸ® How to Play Wool Crush - Color Sort:
1. Tap the cannon that matches the dragonâ€™s color in this 3D wool sort adventure.
2. Aim and fire at the right spots to weaken the wool knitting dragon using car jam style logic.
3. Drive the dragons away and keep the cats safe in relaxing yarn sort games!

âœ¨ Game Features â€“ Relaxing Car Jam Logic Puzzle Adventure
ğŸ§  Pure Puzzle Experience: Every stage challenges your color sort logic, sequence recognition, and wool sort strategy planning.
ğŸ® Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Simple one-tap controls make the car jam and yarn sort gameplay relaxing and casual, while advanced wool sort puzzles test your thinking skills.
ğŸŒˆ Color Sorting + Logic Gameplay: A perfect mix of wool sort, yarn sort, and car jam puzzle mechanics â€” plan, match, and solve every color sort challenge!
ğŸ¯ Clear Puzzle Objectives: Each yarn sort level has a specific goal â€” sort all yarns by color, clear the grid, or unlock the next stage.
ğŸ’¡ Smart Progression System: Puzzles evolve with new rules, car jam obstacles, and wool boosters as you advance, keeping your brain engaged.
ğŸŒŸ Casual Relaxation Meets Brain Challenge: Enjoy smooth 3D visuals and calm soundtracks while completing relaxing color sort puzzles.
ğŸ§¶ Rewarding Completion: Finishing each puzzle brings a deep sense of accomplishment and unlocks new yarn sort modes and visual themes.

Step into Wool Crush and experience the joy of logical thinking, color sorting, and satisfying wool sort puzzle-solving.

title: Arrow Out
summary:
Arrow Out is a clever directional puzzle where every move matters, designed for fans of brain and mind challenges. Your goal is simple: guide the right arrow through the maze and reach freedom in this smart escape experience.

Rotate arrows, shift tiles, and plan ahead using pure logic and spatial thinking. Smooth flow and responsive tap controls make every decision feel precise and satisfying.

With gradually increasing difficulty and thousands of handcrafted levels, Arrow Out stands among the best games for iq improvement, training, and problem solving. Each level works like a compact teaser, pushing you to think ahead and adapt.

When a level gets tricky, helpful boosters are there to support you:
Use Zoom to closely inspect complex paths, Hint to reveal a helpful move, Magic Wand to break through difficult situations, Rubber to erase mistakes, and Grid Scale to adjust the board for better visibility and planning.

Game Features
â€¢ Direction-based logic puzzles with evolving mechanics
â€¢ Relaxing yet challenging brain training games experience
â€¢ Thoughtful escape puzzle and shape escape level design
â€¢ Offline-friendly play with no wifi games for free
â€¢ Precision controls, helpful boosters, and a comfortable dark mode for extended play

Arrow Out blends brain games, mind games, and smart interaction into a polished experience that rewards patience and clever thinking.

Can you find the way out â€” or will your arrows go in circles?

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if you have any feedback, need help beating a level, or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

title: Age of Empires Mobile
summary:
The new Arab Civilization arrives! Download now to switch for free.
Experience Camel Riders and create prosperity!
Join now and forge a new era for your empire!

Age of Empires Mobile combines the familiar elements of Age of Empires with strategic gameplay crafted specifically for the mobile platform to give fans of the genre a brand-new way to enjoy the beloved franchise.

Experience exhilarating gameplay with swift and intense battles, rapid resource gathering and military building, defending against waves of enemies, and forming alliances with hundreds of players to aid in your cause to build a dominant empire.

Immerse yourself in an epic adventure featuring detailed real-time controls, breathtaking visuals, and legendary historical heroes on grand battlefields. Command your empire, unite allies from around the world, and restore your once radiant glory. Embark on a conquest unlike any other!

FEATURES
[EXPERIENCE A NEW AGE OF EMPIRES]
Familiar elements from the classic Age of Empires games merged with brand-new and mobile-specific gameplay. Engage in rapid resource management, develop unique technologies, and train diverse armies to build and defend your kingdom from scratch.

[DOMINATE IMMERSIVE BATTLEFIELDS]
Explore glorious medieval cities transformed into battlegrounds. Strategize meticulously, aiming at archer towers, breaching gates, and seizing central structures. Participate in epic alliance battles with thousands of players worldwide in real-time combat within dynamic, interactive cities, for an authentic medieval battlefield experience on your mobile devices.

[BUILD MIGHTY CIVILIZATIONS]
Choose from 8 civilizations, the magnificent Chinese, the grandiose Romans, the elegant French, the glittering Byzantines, the mystical Egyptians, the solemn British, the exquisite Japanese, and the vibrant Koreans. Each civilization has its corresponding types of troops. With even more civilizations set to debut, experience the medieval era with high-definition graphics and richly detailed environments.

[USE REALISTIC WEATHER AND TERRAIN]
Explore and conquer a vast, vibrant, and realistic medieval world where the weather shifts unpredictably with the seasons. Various weather conditions and terrains will impact your strategic decisions. Torrential rains and droughts can alter the landscape, affecting troop movements. Lightning can damage your armies and structures, while fog obscures vision, hiding potential enemies. Skillfully harness the weather and terrain to enhance your battle effectiveness!

[COMMAND TROOPS & WEAPONS IN REAL TIME]
Lead up to five troops, maneuvering them freely across expansive maps and intense battlegrounds. Control a variety of powerful siege weapons such as trebuchets, alliance towers, battering rams, escalades, and airships to support your alliance in gaining the upper hand in fierce combat. Mastering the controls is crucial!

[DEPLOY LEGENDARY HEROES]
Select from over 70 epic heroes representing various civilizations. Legendary figures like Joan of Arc, Leonidas, and Julius Caesar are joined by intriguing new allies such as Miyamoto Musashi, Hua Mulan, and Rani Durgavati. Combine the unique attributes of these heroes and lead diverse troop types to create your own powerful and unique force!

The game has a level of detail way beyond what I was expecting, with several empires fleshed out with unique heroes, unit designs, city designs, and siege weapons. â€”TheGamer

Even in its new handheld home, that unique Age of Empires brand of spectacle is still spectacular. â€”Pocket Tactics

title: GODDESS OF VICTORY: NIKKE
summary:
GODDESS OF VICTORY: NIKKE is an immersive sci-fi RPG shooter game, where you recruit and command various maidens to form a beautiful anime girl squad that specializes in wielding guns and other unique sci-fi weapons. Command and collect girls that have unique combat specialties to create your ultimate team! Experience next-level shooting action with simple yet intuitive controls while enjoying dynamic battle effects.

Humanity lies in ruins.
The Rapture invasion came without warning. It was both ruthless and overwhelming.
The reason: unknown. No room for negotiations.
In what seemed like an instant, the earth was turned into a sea of fire. Countless humans were hunted down and slaughtered without mercy.
None of mankind's modern technology stood a chance against this colossal invasion.
There was nothing that could be done. The humans were laid to waste.
Those that managed to survive found one thing that gave them the smallest glimmer of hope: the humanoid weapons.
However, once developed, these new weapons were far from the miracle everyone needed. Instead of turning the tide, they only managed to make a minor dent.
It was a complete and utter defeat.
Humans lost their homeland to the Rapture and were forced to live deep underground.

Decades later, a group of girls awakens in the Ark, mankind's new home.
They are the result of the collective technological knowledge pooled together by all the humans driven underground.
The girls board an elevator to the surface. It has not been operated for decades.
Humanity prays.
May the girls be their swords.
May they become the blade that enacts revenge for humanity.
Born out of mankind's desperation, the girls head to the world above, carrying the hopes and dreams of the human race on their shoulders.
They are code-named Nikke, a name derived from the Greek Goddess of Victory, Nike.
Mankind's last hope for victory.


â–¶ Stand-out Characters with Distinctive Personalities
Alluring and extraordinary Nikkes.
Watch as character illustrations jump off the page and straight into battle.
Play now!

â–¶ Featuring vivid, high-quality illustrations.
Advanced animation and animated illustration with cutting-edge technology,
including the latest physics engine and plot-based auto motion-sensing controls.
Witness characters and images, unlike anything youâ€™ve seen before.

â–¶ Experience The First-hand Unique Tactics
Use a variety of character weapons and Burst Skills
to take down the overwhelming invaders.
Feel the thrill of a brand-new innovative battle system.

â–¶ A Sweeping In-Game World and Plot
Play your way through a post-apocalyptic tale
with a story that offers both thrills and chills.

title: Zenless Zone Zero
summary:
Don't go into Hollows.
I know, I know, there are Ether resources in the Hollows, bizarre creations, even ruins of the old civilization â€” all invaluable treasures.
But don't forget about the spatial disorder, the monsters, and mutants running rampant. Ultimately, this is a disaster that could swallow the world. Hollows are not where ordinary people should go.
So don't go into Hollows.
Or at least, don't go in alone.
If you insist on getting into danger, go to New Eridu first.
This city full of people from all walks of life has many who need the Hollows: powerful and wealthy tycoons, gangs who rule the streets, schemers hiding in the shadows, and ruthless officials.
Make your preparations there, find strong allies, and most importantly...
Find a "Proxy."
Only they can guide people out of labyrinthian Hollows.
Good luck.

Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse that takes place in a near future, with the world plagued by a mysterious disaster known as "Hollows."

Dual Identities, a Singular Experience
In the near future, a mysterious natural disaster known as "Hollows" has occurred. A new kind of city has emerged in this disaster-ridden world â€” New Eridu. This last oasis has mastered the technology to co-exist with Hollows and is home to a whole host of chaotic, boisterous, dangerous, and very active factions. As a professional Proxy, you play a crucial role in linking the city and the Hollows. Your story awaits.

Build Your Squad and Fight Fast-Paced Battles
Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse, here to provide a thrilling combat experience. Build a squad of up to three and begin your assault with Basic and Special Attacks. Dodge and Parry to neutralize your opponents' counterattacks, and when they're Stunned, unleash a powerful combo of Chain Attacks to finish them off! Remember, different opponents have different traits, and it would be prudent to use their weaknesses to your advantage.

Immerse Yourself in the Unique Style and Music
Zenless Zone Zero has a unique visual style and design. With its carefully crafted character expressions and fluid movements, you'll easily feel immersed in the fascinating world as you embark on your own journey~ And of course, every VIP deserves their very own soundtrack, so you'll also have emotional beats full of drip to accompany you in each unforgettable moment~

Various Factions and Stories Entwined
Random Play can't operate without videotapes, and Proxies can't operate without Agents. In New Eridu, customers from all walks will come knocking. So don't be fooled by their innocent and cute appearances, don't be afraid of those who tower over you and look dangerous, and don't turn away the fluffy ones who might shed fur all over your spotless floor. Go and talk with them, learn about their unique experiences, and allow them to become your friends and allies. After all, this is a long path, and only with companions will you be able to walk far~

title: Jigsolitaire
summary:
Combine the photos on the cards correctly to complete a single picture. Once you experience the satisfying snap of the cards fitting perfectly, you'll be hooked for sure!

[Game Features]
- Enjoy Completing Photos by Combining Cards
Even if the cards seem random at first, finding the exact spot they fit brings unmatched satisfaction!

- Intuitive Swipe Controls
Simply swipe to move the cards. When cards stick together, you can move them as a group, making gameplay smooth and easy.

- Exhilarating Chain Reactions
The thrill of multiple cards locking into place all at once is seriously addictive. This is a puzzle game with high replay value.

- Designed for All Skill Levels
Whether you have a bit of free time or want a longer play session, this game is perfect. You'll find new discoveries each time you play!

- Wide Variety of Themed Photos
From flowers and landscapes to animals, we plan to continuously add a diverse range of photos!

[How to Play]
- Swipe to Move Cards
Swipe your screen to drag the cards wherever you like.

- Move Connected Cards All at Once
When cards are placed correctly, they snap together. You can then move the connected group of cards as a single unit.

- Caution When Overlapping Large and Small Cards
If you place a small card on top of a larger one, the larger card may shrink. Pay close attention to any size changes and combine them carefully.

Despite its simple controls, "Jigsolitaire" offers depth through strategic card placement. Whether you love jigsaw puzzles, enjoy solitaire, or just want a fun and easy puzzle, give it a try!

â– About [Eternal Pass]
It is a monthly service that allows for increased stage challenge attempts and item grants.

â– Service Content 1
Upgrade Stages (Capital) Challenge Limit 1Up
Upgrade Stages (Units) Challenge Limit 1Up
Upgrade Stages (Characters) Challenge Limit 1Up
Upgrade Stages (Supporters) Challenge Limit 1Up

ãƒ»The above effects will be applied during the subscription period.

â– Service Content 2
Premium Unit Assembly TicketÃ—5
Limited Time AP Pack (Effective for 30 days)Ã—5

ãƒ»The items will be granted upon logging in after the purchase or renewal.
*If the maximum holding limit is exceeded, the items will be granted to the present box.
*The Limited Time AP Pack is effective for 30 days from the granting date.
It will expire 30 days later even if not used.

â– Validity Period and Auto-Renewal
ãƒ»The effective period of the Eternal Pass is one month after purchase and it will be automatically renewed.
*One month refers to the same date and time of the next month from the purchase date.

Example: If purchased at 1:00 AM on January 1, it is valid until 0:59 AM on February 1.
*If the same date does not exist in the next month, it will be valid until the closest date within the next month.
Example: If purchased at 1:00 AM on March 31, it is valid until 0:59 AM on April 30.
*Depending on the timing of the purchase or renewal, such as around the turn of the month, there may be a few days' discrepancy in the reflection timing on the platform side.

ãƒ»To cancel the Eternal Pass, please cancel it at least 3 days (72 hours) before the automatic renewal.
*If you miss the 3 days (72 hours) deadline, there may be a timing discrepancy on the platform side, preventing the intended cancellation timing.

ãƒ»Even if you cancel during the validity period, you will receive the Eternal Pass benefits until the expiration of the validity period.
Example: If purchased at 1:00 AM on January 1 and canceled on January 2 during the validity period, you will still receive the benefits until 0:59 AM on February 1.

â– How to Cancel
You can cancel your subscription by:

Selecting your user icon from the [Play Store].
Selecting [Payments and subscriptions].
Selecting [Subscriptions].
Selecting [SD Gundam G Generation Eternal].
Then, choose [Cancel subscription].

title: Space Waves
summary: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.

title: Brick Blast - Ball Breaker
summary:
Brick Blast - Ball Breaker is an engaging bricks and balls game with simple rules, a hint of challenge, and plenty of effortless fun. Pick your angle, shoot the balls, and watch them blast through every brick in their path.

Brick Blast delivers pure enjoyment with no rush or pressure. Play at your own pace and enjoy smooth, dynamic gameplay that will help you unwind while training your logic and focus.

How to Play Brick Blast:

The goal is simple: break the bricks and keep the board clear. Swipe to aim and release to shootâ€”the ball shooter sends glowing balls flying across the screen, bouncing off walls and smashing through colorful blocks. Plan your shots wisely to hit the best angles, clear multiple bricks at once, and watch the balls bounce out across the board in dazzling chains of glowing hits before the blocks reach the bottom line.

Discover power blocks that make this block breaker even more exciting:

â€¢ Laser shoots across rows or columns, damaging all blocks along its path.
â€¢ Multiplier triples your balls for massive combos.
â€¢ Redirect changes the path to reach tricky angles.
â€¢ Extra Ball gives you more power until the end of the round.

Use power blocks skillfully to enjoy mighty ball blasts and brick-breaking chain reactions.

Why Youâ€™ll Love Brick Blast:

âœ” An easy-to-play brick breaker game with a modern look and smooth graphics.
âœ” Dynamic levels packed with special blocks, combos, ball blasts, and glowing brick breaker effects.
âœ” A calming pastimeâ€”no pressure, no time limits, just pure focus and pleasure.
âœ” A fun way to unwind while honing your strategy skillsâ€”perfect for players who love puzzle quests and brick-breaking games.
âœ” Endless ball breaker gameplay that keeps you coming back for more.

Take a break, play Brick Blast - Ball Breaker, and feel the joy of every perfect shot!

title: Candy Crush Saga
summary:
Master the legendary match 3 puzzle game from King and have a blast! With over a trillion matching levels played, Candy Crush Saga is the popular match 3 puzzle game!

Match, pop, and blast candies in this tasty puzzle adventure to progress to the next level and get a sugar blast! Master match 3 puzzles with quick thinking and smart matching moves to be rewarded with sugar bonuses and tasty candy combos.

Spread jam by matching 3 or more candies in a row and blast your way through the extra sticky puzzles using jelly fishes! Blast jam and chocolate to collect sweet candy juice across thousands of puzzle levels, guaranteed to have you craving more!

BECOME THE MASTER OF THE CANDY KINGDOM
- Win thousands of sweet matching puzzles: with new puzzles added every 2 weeks, your sugar fix is never far away!

WIN CANDYLICIOUS REWARDS
- Spin the Daily Booster Wheel to receive jelly fishes and other tasty rewards! Master time-limited match 3 challenges to earn boosters and clear the jelly!

VARIETY OF SUGAR-COATED PUZZLE GAMES
- Sweet ways to play! Play match 3 game modes and more including Sweet Escape and Clear the Jelly.
- Level up playing match 3 puzzles that range from easy to hard, accessible online or offline.

BLAST CANDIES WITH FRIENDS
- Match and pop candies to get to the top of the leaderboard! Compare scores with friends and find out whoâ€™s the match 3 master!
- Enjoy the sweetest of match 3 puzzle games around!

If you want to master and blast even more puzzles, you may also enjoy other games from King: Candy Crush Soda Saga, Farm Heroes Saga, and Pet Rescue Saga.

Candy Crush Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your deviceâ€™s settings.
