title: Doomsday Ã— Attack on Titan
summary:
The epic Attack on Titan collaboration has arrived! Team up with Eren and step through the rift in time to face a new set of trials in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront the threat of massive mutants head-on! Overcome ultimate challenges to unlock exclusive new Heroes and Shelter Skins, plus claim a ton of collaboration rewards. Commander, the truth about this world awaits you. Join the fight now and make this battlefield your own!

Doomsday: Last Survivors is a zombie survival game with multiplayer online competition and real-time strategy elements. Set in a near future where zombies have taken over the world, survivors must fight for their lives and humanity's future. As the Commander, you must lead fellow survivors to build their Shelter, explore fog-filled areas, and fight the zombies and rival factions! Are you tired of the usual strategy games and love zombie games? Check out Doomsday: Last Survivors to experience the exciting survival game!

[Game Highlights]

New Tower Defense Gameplay
Find new ways to beat your enemies in one of the coolest strategy games! Skilled survivors will join you to explore this fallen world oozing with the infected. Stay sharp, set up ideal Hero formations, and construct fortifications to survive the zombie invasion!

Survival of the Fittest
Lead troops and civilians in your Shelter! Exterminate zombies to survive the apocalypse, or raid other Shelters to sustain your own. You can also form an alliance and fight enemies with your allies in one of the best survival games!

A Realistic Doomsday Experience
The crisis continues to loom over us in a cruel world where it's kill or be killed. Want to experience one of the best immersive survival experiences in zombie games? Look no further! Check out the realistic spherical terrain system with convenient zoom controls that enable close-up Shelter views to satellite views. Download Doomsday: Last Survivors today!

Strategic Battles
Become the best at survival games by utilizing everything you can find. Train multiple troop types and execute diverse battle strategies with Hero skills and attacks to outlast the zombie hordes.

Unique Heroes
Realistic and exciting Hero designs portray survivors from different walks of life. Recruit talented Heroes to help lead your troops, defend your Shelter, and beat one of the best strategy games!

Commander, are you ready to survive the apocalypse?
Become the best at zombie games with your strength and wits!

===Information===
Official TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@doomsdaylastsurvivor
Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/DoomsdayLastSurvivors
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/doomsdaylastsurvivors
Customer Support: help.doomsday.android@igg.com

title: Age of Empires Mobile
summary:
The new Arab Civilization arrives! Download now to switch for free.
Experience Camel Riders and create prosperity!
Join now and forge a new era for your empire!

Age of Empires Mobile combines the familiar elements of Age of Empires with strategic gameplay crafted specifically for the mobile platform to give fans of the genre a brand-new way to enjoy the beloved franchise.

Experience exhilarating gameplay with swift and intense battles, rapid resource gathering and military building, defending against waves of enemies, and forming alliances with hundreds of players to aid in your cause to build a dominant empire.

Immerse yourself in an epic adventure featuring detailed real-time controls, breathtaking visuals, and legendary historical heroes on grand battlefields. Command your empire, unite allies from around the world, and restore your once radiant glory. Embark on a conquest unlike any other!

FEATURES
[EXPERIENCE A NEW AGE OF EMPIRES]
Familiar elements from the classic Age of Empires games merged with brand-new and mobile-specific gameplay. Engage in rapid resource management, develop unique technologies, and train diverse armies to build and defend your kingdom from scratch.

[DOMINATE IMMERSIVE BATTLEFIELDS]
Explore glorious medieval cities transformed into battlegrounds. Strategize meticulously, aiming at archer towers, breaching gates, and seizing central structures. Participate in epic alliance battles with thousands of players worldwide in real-time combat within dynamic, interactive cities, for an authentic medieval battlefield experience on your mobile devices.

[BUILD MIGHTY CIVILIZATIONS]
Choose from 8 civilizations, the magnificent Chinese, the grandiose Romans, the elegant French, the glittering Byzantines, the mystical Egyptians, the solemn British, the exquisite Japanese, and the vibrant Koreans. Each civilization has its corresponding types of troops. With even more civilizations set to debut, experience the medieval era with high-definition graphics and richly detailed environments.

[USE REALISTIC WEATHER AND TERRAIN]
Explore and conquer a vast, vibrant, and realistic medieval world where the weather shifts unpredictably with the seasons. Various weather conditions and terrains will impact your strategic decisions. Torrential rains and droughts can alter the landscape, affecting troop movements. Lightning can damage your armies and structures, while fog obscures vision, hiding potential enemies. Skillfully harness the weather and terrain to enhance your battle effectiveness!

[COMMAND TROOPS & WEAPONS IN REAL TIME]
Lead up to five troops, maneuvering them freely across expansive maps and intense battlegrounds. Control a variety of powerful siege weapons such as trebuchets, alliance towers, battering rams, escalades, and airships to support your alliance in gaining the upper hand in fierce combat. Mastering the controls is crucial!

[DEPLOY LEGENDARY HEROES]
Select from over 70 epic heroes representing various civilizations. Legendary figures like Joan of Arc, Leonidas, and Julius Caesar are joined by intriguing new allies such as Miyamoto Musashi, Hua Mulan, and Rani Durgavati. Combine the unique attributes of these heroes and lead diverse troop types to create your own powerful and unique force!

The game has a level of detail way beyond what I was expecting, with several empires fleshed out with unique heroes, unit designs, city designs, and siege weapons. â€”TheGamer

Even in its new handheld home, that unique Age of Empires brand of spectacle is still spectacular. â€”Pocket Tactics

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@ageofempiresmobile
Discord: https://go.aoemobile.com/goDiscord
X: https://twitter.com/AOE_Mobile
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ageofempiresmobile_official

title: Hunting Sniper
summary:
Hunting Sniper - The Ultimate Free Hunting Experience

Embark on a thrilling journey into the wild with Hunting Sniper. Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of stalking and capturing wild animals in their natural habitats.

Unparalleled Wildlife Encounters

Step into a world teeming with real animals, each indigenous to their respective territories. Traverse diverse and authentic hunting locations spanning continents. Set your sights on a majestic big buck, a cunning fox, a ferocious coyote or a formidable bear in the rugged landscapes of Yellowstone Park, USA. Chase after the elusive rhinoceros along the banks of the Nile in Egypt. Venture into the frigid expanse of the Arctic Ocean, Russia, and lay in wait for a massive walrus. Embark on an enthralling mission to capture a dingo amidst the sprawling Australian Outback, and prepare for many more extraordinary encounters. All of this right at your fingertips on your mobile device.

Arms and Arsenal

Marvel at the extensive array of weaponry at your disposal in Hunting Sniper. Experience unparalleled precision, exquisite design, and unmatched quality that enhance your hunting expedition. Elevate your weapon's performance with weapon tokens, allowing you to tailor your arsenal to perfection. And that's not all - complement your gear with cutting-edge bullets bullets to unlock impressive rewards and secure the trophy of a lifetime.

Seamless Gameplay Mastery

Revolutionize your hunting experience with game controls that redefine excellence. Hunting Sniper's intuitive controls empower you to hunt with finesse and pinpoint accuracy. Say goodbye to frustrating gameplay experiences that leave you tempted to toss your smartphone aside. Engage in silky-smooth gun control, mirroring real-life precision.

The Ultimate Hunter's Challenge

Hunting Sniper is the sole hunting game that boasts thrilling tournaments and championships. Hone your hunting prowess as you vie against fellow hunters in intense PvP battles. Prove yourself as the unrivaled deer hunting monarch, a title earned through sheer skill and determination.

Soar to New Heights

Can you defy gravity and reach for the skies? As you immerse yourself in the captivating world of Hunting Sniper, you'll find yourself striving for new heights in the pursuit of greatness.

Hunter's Delight

Throughout your adventure, the captivating sights and sounds of the wild will surround you. The words "deer" and "hunter" will become your rallying cries as you aim for the ultimate hunting triumph. Will you seize the opportunity to become the ultimate predator and secure your place as the apex hunter? The call of the wild awaits â€“ answer it with Hunting Sniper.

title: RAID: Shadow Legends
summary:
Summon over 800 legendary heroes from 15 factions to battle bosses like fearsome dragons and colossal demons. Explore dungeons, enjoy turn-based multiplayer action, and master tactics to free Teleria in this epic role-playing game!

Tactical battles await in this turn-based dark fantasy role-playing game, where you can summon hundreds of Champions from 15 playable factions.

Fight the forces of the dark lord Siroth with your legendary band of immortal warriors. Train them for battle, craft the perfect strategy, and assemble the greatest raiding party ever seen.

Epic clashes await in online modes like the multiplayer Arena, where you can put your team of Champions against others in strategic RPG battles. Experiment with over 1+ million possible Champion builds, craft the ultimate team and their battle tactics, and be the best!

With over 5 years of free content updates and a community that grows bigger every day, join millions of players in the war to liberate Teleria from Siroth and his legions. Become a hero of legend!

| Enjoy deep RPG features |

Collect powerful Champions
Summon 800+ warriors from 15 factions in this tactical role-playing game. Call upon orcs, knights, elves, and more dark fantasy creatures to defeat any threat that stands in your way.

Strategic turn-based RPG gameplay
Equip your Champions with amazing artifacts to aid them in battle. Rank them up to unleash devastating skills, AOE attacks, magic powers and more as you lead them in combat.

Fight epic boss battles
Do you dare take on the Magma Dragon, the Fire Knight, or the Ice Golem? Vanquish challenging bosses in dangerous dungeons for loot, XP, and special Champion drops. Then, in classic turn-based RPG style, fight them again for more powerful gear!

Feel the visceral 3D artwork
Beautiful, fully-rendered 3D heroes offer stunning detail down to the cracks in their armor. Marvel at a vivid fantasy world with thousands of unique skill and attack animations.

Join forces with your Clan
Team up with fellow players and take on challenges like the fearsome Demon Lord with Clans! Battle other Clans in special tournaments and show them that theyâ€™re out of your league.

Face the multiplayer PvP Arena
Go head-to-head with other players in fierce turn-based combat to unlock special gear. Rise through the ranks and become an Arena legend.

Develop and manage your Bastion
Upgrade your own personal fortress to manage your Shards and ready your Champions for dungeon runs, multiplayer arena combat, and the story campaign.

Clear our massive PvE Campaign map
Experience epic dark fantasy done right through 12 spectacular RPG locations spread over a sprawling, fully-voiced story campaign. Heed your heroic duty and conquer the forces of Darkness.

Dive into a deep fantasy world
Learn about Teleriaâ€™s heroes and villains with our growing collection of Champion bios. Then, check out our animated limited series, RAID: Call of the Arbiter, on YouTube!

Please note:
Items are available for purchase in this fantasy MMO role-playing game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.

RAID Official Website: https://plarium.com/
RAID Support: raid.support@plarium.com
Our RPG Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/raid-shadow-legends/
Privacy Policy: https://plarium.com/en/legal/privacy-and-cookie-policy/
Terms of Use: https://plarium.com/en/legal/terms-of-use/

title: Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond
summary:
Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond is a brand-new strategy card game from the popular Shadowverse CCG.
Enjoy creating decks and battling online, just like the original Shadowverse CCG.
With the newly added super-evolution mechanic and Shadowverse Park, among other brand-new content, there is lots to enjoy for both seasoned and brand-new players.

Card Battles
The rules of Shadowverse are simple, yet offer limitless ways to strategize and win.
Use different card combinations to create unique synergies and strategies in battles against players all around the world.
Dive into the game and enjoy strategic card battles with breathtaking graphics and effects.

New Game Mechanic: Super-Evolution
Each of your followers (unit cards you play on the field) can now super-evolve!
Followers that have super-evolved are stronger and can knock opposing followers out with powerful attacks and deal damage straight to their leader!Â 
Super-evolve your followers and enjoy exhilarating card battles like never before!

Free Card Pack Every Day
Log in to open a free card pack every day!
Collect cards for the new compendium feature!
Enjoy battling and collecting!

Class
Choose from 7 unique classes that match your playstyle and create custom decks.
Tailor your deck to match your strategy and style, then dive into epic card battles!

Story
Experience a brand new Shadowverse story where characters are brought to life with full voice acting!
Follow spectacular stories centered around seven unique characters, each bringing their own personality to the adventure.

New Feature: Shadowverse Park
Step into the Shadowverse CCG community where players can connect and interact!
Show off your avatar with customizable outfits and emotes, bond with others, and grow stronger together!

Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond is recommended to the following:
- Fans of card games and collecting cards
- Players who like collectible card games (CCG) or trading card games (TCG)
- Long-time fans and players of the Shadowverse CCG
- Players who enjoy PvP card games
- People who have played other TCG and CCG before
- Players who are looking for new TCG and CCG
- Fans of strategic trading card games (TCG) and collectible card games (CCG)
- Players who are looking for card games with compelling full-scale stories
- Card collectors who appreciate beautifully designed collectible or trading cards
- People who want to connect and interact with others through gaming

title: Hunter Raid: Idle RPG Games
summary:
Embark on an epic journey in one of the most thrilling idle RPG games, where strategy, action, and progression come together in an immersive experience! Hunter Raid offers a perfect blend of fast-paced action and AFK progression, making it an exciting choice for fans of idle RPG games and battle games alike.

Idle RPG Game Features:

Explore Cool Dungeons with Diverse Worlds:
- Venture through various realms such as Past, Present, Wulin, and Otherworld with stunning visuals, smooth animations, and spectacular battle effects.
- This idle RPG game immerses you in its captivating worlds, letting you experience the thrill of adventure without the grind.

Unique Job Advancement System:
- Progress through the Building of Trials, where you defeat characters from other dimensions, absorb their power, and grow stronger.
- Discover diverse skill sets from classes like Berserker, Kensei, Swordmaster, and Dimension Knight - each offering new layers of strategy and depth.

Idle Play, AFK Rewards, and Fast Growth:
- As a true idle RPG game, enjoy AFK progression where you continue to grow and collect rewards even when offline.
- Upgrade your characters effortlessly, gathering resources in your sleep and improving your stats every day!

Multiplayer Games and Guild System:
- Join forces with others in the Hunter Union, where youâ€™ll form guilds to conquer battles together. The multiplayer games element ensures thereâ€™s always a way to collaborate and compete with friends.
- Participate in thrilling PVP battles in the Hunter Arena, showcasing your skills and strategies against other players worldwide.

Epic Customization & Beast Fusion:
- Stand out in battle with various unique costumes to customize your characterâ€™s appearance.
- Power up using the Beast Fusion System, unlocking new strengths and abilities to conquer even tougher challenges.

Intriguing Storyline - Hunter Story Chapter 1:
A mysterious red portal has brought devastating monsters to Earth, wiping out 90% of the human population. As monsters continue to pour through these gateways, humanityâ€™s last hope lies in the hands of the Hunters. You must transcend your limits, explore the dimensions of Past, Present, Wulin, and Otherworld, and fight back against the monstrous invasion.

The Ultimate Idle RPG Journey Awaits:
Hunter Raid delivers everything fans of idle RPG games crave - non-stop action, strategic growth, and rich rewards with minimal effort. Whether you're looking for a casual AFK journey or intense battle games, this idle RPG game offers it all. Dive into grinding games that make progression fun and rewarding, upgrade games that emphasize character development, and multiplayer games that allow for cooperative and competitive gameplay.

The battlefield is calling - are you ready to summon powerful forces, conquer your enemies, and unlock the hidden secrets of the red portal? Join the AFK adventure and begin your quest to become the ultimate Hunter!

title: Lost Sword
summary:
Epic Anime Fantasy RPG
Endless Romantic "Action X Flirting" with the Girls!

Begin the otherworld anime journey with the unique characters from Lost Sword now.
Meet the action flirting RPG with vivid character skill display and strong story line.

â€œHoly Sword Excalibur, forged by fairies,
has godlike powers that can halve a mountain in a single swing.
This divine relic of the Fairy, at some point, vanished without a trace;
it shall reappear to serve the true king when the blessing of the Red Dragon fades away.
This prophecy had only been taken as myth, but recently grew in prominence,
after Uther Pendragon, who had the blessing of the Red Dragon, was struck down by the False King Vortigern.
The war to determine the true king commenced,
and King Utherâ€™s daughter, Elizabeth Pendragon, left to find Excalibur, but went missing.
Thus began the Great Disorder.â€

Princess Elizabeth, who holds strong mind beneath her gentle smile,

and finally, Ethan, who joins the adventure to find the Holy Sword along with them!

title: Cat Hero : Idle RPG
summary:
â€œI, as a Cat Hero, will vanquish all monsters tormenting my master in his dream!"

Fish Cannon? Check.
Cuteness and Bravery? Double Check!
It is a Cat Hero's sworn duty to protect their master from all forms of threat even if it means from their dreams.

However, even the dark of the nightmare can make a hero's fur stand up. But fear not for you are not alone! You will meet friends, companions, and join forces with other Cat Heroes from all over the world on this quest to make sure the master feeds the cat and cleans the hairballs sitting by the corners.

â–  Explore the Vast Dreamland in Cute, Quality Graphics
Take on epic raid bosses, stroll along coastlines, fight the monsters of the ocean, and soar into the skies as you journey in this dreamland that is beautifully crafted in cute, quality graphics.

â–  Simply Tap to Merge Fishes Endlessly and Grow Stronger
Merge fishes to make your fish missiles stronger. The Magic Tank will fill the fish so don't worry about running out of fish!

â–  Meet Companions to Customize your Build for Greater Firepower
Choose from over 40 skills and 50 companions! Befriend Sausage, Bread, Chicken, Wolves, Pirates, and even a Tank Commander to unleash tons of damage. And letâ€™s not forget about the runes that aid your build!

â–  Join Forces with other Cat Heroes to Enjoy More Content
Cooperate with your guild to conquer the battlefield and win the siege. Win special gear and more rewards from the guild fights and share the sweet taste of victories with your mates.

â–  Wind Down with Diverse Range of Contents for Endless Fun
Even Heroes need to catch a break every now and then. Customize in style with various skins and participate in various engaging minigames to get loads of rewards. Manage your Cat Town or visit someone elseâ€™s to either help or interrupt them! And when you are ready to battle again, test your strength in Arena for special rewards!

â–  Let it Idle
Go offline and your companions will fight for you. AFK rewards pile up up to 24 hours, so come back any time to upgrade your team!

Join the ranks of Cat Heroes and protect your masterâ€™s dreams! Download and play now for free!

ğŸš€ Time-limited access for Project Ark Rebuild NOW!

This is the only and final choice for humanity. Fight to the end and protect Earth from alien invaders. Are you ready to take on the challenges of this thrilling tower defense game?

-Build Diverse Turrets
Each turret has unique skills and powers for you to explore. Unlock and upgrade them to resist enemy attacks and fight back effectively.

-Strategize Your Turret Assembly
Choose turrets based on enemy attributes and maximize their abilities. Continuously refine your strategy to achieve ultimate victory.

-Power Up Your Character
Equip your character with powerful chips and weapons, each offering different epic effects. Upgrading these items will significantly boost your combat power.

-Choose the Best Upgrades
Defeat enemies to recharge your energy and select from a variety of upgrades to enhance your combat power. Experience the thrill of a roguelike game!

-Collect Abundant Resources
Each battle rewards you with plentiful resources to strengthen your character and turrets. Win battles, collect rewards, and upgrade to progress further.

-Take on Expedition Challenges
Join forces with players worldwide to resist powerful alien enemies and defend the last line of our planet's defense. Remember, you are not fighting alone.

As the commander of this fortress, letâ€™s protect our planet together!

title: THE KING OF FIGHTERS AFK
summary:
The legendary fighting game The King of Fighters returns!
Play now and battle to become the best fighter in the world!

â–¶ The action-packed series KOF has been reimagined as an idle game!
KOF is back with a retro look and feel!
Power up your pixel fighters and beat your opponents!

â–¶ Infinite power! Infinite fun! Power up with one tap!
No more tedious grinding! Tap once to boost your Combat Power!
Welcome to the world of quick & easy power ups!

â–¶ KOF enhanced! Duke it out in big 5 vs. 5 fights!
The fight is now on a bigger scale! Emerge victorious in exciting 5 vs. 5 team battles.
Bigger moments and even bigger fights await!

â–¶ Strategize to become the King of Fighters!
Adapt to each fight with different placements and combinations!
Form the ultimate team and make your way to the top!

â–¶ You are the hero in THE KING OF FIGHTERS AFK!
Join forces with other Fighters and stop the factions trying to ruin the tournament!
Set off on a journey to become the champion of KOF!

â–¶ Tons of events, tons of rewards!
Join them all and quickly power up!
Get rewards just by logging in, and use them to make the strongest team of fighters in the tournament!

Get the latest news and learn more on the official community pages!
- Official Site: https://kofafk.netmarble.com/
- Official Forums: https://forum.netmarble.com/kofafk
- Official YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@KOFAFK
- Official instagram : https://www.instagram.com/kof_afk/

Specifications
- Minimum specifications: Android 9.0 or higher, 4GB RAM

â€» This app offers in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your deviceâ€™s settings.
â€» By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

- Terms of Service: https://help.netmarble.com/terms/terms_of_service_en
- Privacy Policy: https://help.netmarble.com/terms/privacy_policy_en?lcLocale=en

title: Toon Blast
summary:
From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

â— Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
â— Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
â— Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
â— Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
â— Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world!
â— Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing!
â— Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
â— Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
summary:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, itâ€™s the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Gokuâ€™s Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyoneâ€™s favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
â€¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
â€¢ Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
â€¢ Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
â€¢ Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
â€¢ From Gokuâ€™s Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegetaâ€™s Final Flash, all your favorites are here
â€¢ Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
â€¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
â€¢ Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
â€¢ Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
â€¢ Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
â€¢ Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline
â€¢ Play the board game-style map and all-new story with your favorite Dragon Ball characters!
â€¢ Experience reimagined stories with DB characters new and old

Are you ready to go even further beyond? Download one of the best DRAGON BALL experiences available with DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE today for free!

title: High Seas Hero
summary:
One day, land vanishes with rising seas. Hunger, illness, and mutants killed 80% of mankind.

You, a survivor, emerge as hero of high seas.

â–¶ Endless Weapon Upgrades
Engage in tough battles with easy gameplay. Tap to upgrade the weapons with post-apocalyptic technology.
Enjoy a bounty of rewards even while you're AFK.

â–¶ Defeat Endless Enemies
Defend yourself with full effort from enemies' rain of bullets. Worse still, hundreds of fierce beasts block your way. Take everything possible to boost your power and increase your chances of survival.

â–¶ Assemble Legendary Crews
Only the fittest can survive the apocalypse. Survivors with unique skills are scattered across the icy world, from naval officers to doctors, engineers, and pilots, all waiting to follow your lead.

â–¶ Renovate the Cabins
It's not just the enemies that pose a threatâ€”the pervasive cold does too.
You must manage resources carefully to renovate and build cabins, which will protect your crew from harsh environments. Whether to prioritize technological development or crew sustenance is up to you.

â–¶ Ascend the Warship
Your ship, your rules! Forge your own warship: armored tank, speedy assassin, or powerful battleship.
Also, choose from hundreds of custom looks!

â–¶ Unite to Survive
Sailing solo is brave, but teamwork is key to thriving. Join forces with fellow sea adventurers, form a powerful alliance, take on formidable bosses together, and stake your claim on the high seas!

---------------
[Official website]
https://highseashero.centurygames.com/

[Facebook]
https://www.facebook.com/HighSeasHero.global/

[Discord]
https://discord.gg/gUUMJm7r6a

Contact Us: highseashero_contact@centurygame.com

title: Another Dungeon
summary:
As a young man of the Kabi, Dokebi has the lost power of his tribe.
Explore the vast continent with lots of friends and enjoy the dynamic journey!
Discover the lost power of the Kabi in Another Dungeon!

â–¶Â MMORPG full of awesome pixel art action!
Wreak havoc in this speedy, action-filled world of unique pixel graphics! Drag-and-drop is all you need to cast powerful skills! Experience mighty action, easy and simple.

â–¶Â Kill and be killed in PvP!
In the vast fields you can attack not only mobs but also other players. Go on the hunt and become ever stronger! Your journey to becoming the mightiest Kabi begins now!

â–¶ Time is gold and other items!
Experience the thrill of easy-breezy growth. When youâ€™re busy, let your character alone and theyâ€™ll do all the work and gain more items for growth!
â–¶ Enjoy unique costumes!
Each costume has a different set of powers and effects. Customize to suit your play style and fashion sense!

â–¶ Collect to your heartâ€™s content!
Unique Pets support you in battle and make you stronger! Fight together with special Pets that give you boosts with various abilities.

Inquiry: anotherdungeon@gameduo.net
Terms of Service: https://gameduo.net/en/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://gameduo.net/en/privacy-policy/

title: í•´ì GO! ë³´ë¬¼íƒí—˜ëŒ€
summary:
1. 100+ Pirates to Collect, Build Your Own Legendary Crew

Step into ã€Ší•´ì GO! ë³´ë¬¼íƒí—˜ëŒ€ã€‹, where you can collect 100+ faithfully designed pirate heroes. From the Straw Hat Crew's Gum-Gum Gatling to the Four Emperors' exclusive SSR, each hero comes with its own skill animation and story. Unlock rare heroes through Recruitment or Dungeon Drops, and mix and match different decks to create your favorite lineup. Let Luffy and Shanks fight side by side and build your dream pirate crew.

2. Team Up with Friends, Sail TogetherâœˆğŸ˜†

This isn't just about collecting cards, it's about adventure and teamwork. Form your own Pirate Fleet, invite your friends, and take on challenges together. Or match with other players and tackle co-op battles like God Valley and Marineford War. Time your combos, trigger special skills, and uncover hidden treasures. You can also join Pirate Banquets or Exchange, swap extra cards, and share tips with your crew along the way.

3. Cross-Server Battles, Be the Pirate KingğŸ§¢

Join weekly Fleet Battles against players from all servers and climb from Apprentice Pirate to Pirate King through eight ranks. The higher your rank, the more rewards and exclusive frames you unlock. Take part in Bull Fight Arena, a limited-time tournament where teams compete in elimination rounds streamed live across the server. Earn Arena Coins to trade for rare gear and leave your name on the Pirate Glory Board for everyone to see.

The adventure's waiting. Download now and start your pirate journey.

title: Capybara Go!
summary:
Love capybaras so much you want to play as one? Get ready to embark on a whimsical adventure with a bunch of furry, feathery, fantastic friends!
Introducing the craziest capybara roguelike adventure RPG!
Dive into the world of capybaras with "CAPYBARA GO"!

- Your journey starts and ends with the capybara! Befriend it, bond with it, deck it out with the best gear and explore the wild!
- Endless adventures with randomized events, conquer the challenges ahead!
- Forge kindred bonds with other animal companions! Form alliances and face dangers together!
- Will you take the road off the beaten path or go the chaotic capybara route? Uncover hidden secrets with your capybara companion!

Victory or defeat depends entirely on your choices and luck (good, bad and ugly)!
CAPYBARA GO - A text-based roguelike RPG starring a capybara! Dive headfirst into bizarre adventures with some whismy, some irreverence, and a shovelful of good olâ€™ madness in this cute capy caper!

title: Wing Fighter
summary:
Still looking for a thrilling aerial shooting game? Launch into infinite possibilities with Wing Fighter!

Gameplay Features:
Dense Bullet Hell: Show off dazzling skills!
Massive Gear & Pilots: Mix and match to customize YOUR ultimate fighter!
Multiple Challenges: Fight for your Legion's glory!

Download Wing Fighter! Unleash Full Firepower! Liberate the Skies!

title: Minecraft: Dream it, Build it!
summary:
Dive into an open world of building, crafting, and survival in the ultimate sandbox adventure. Gather resources, survive the night, and build a world one block at a time. Explore and craft your way through a completely open world where you can play with friends, new and old. Build a city, start a farm, mine deep underground, face mysterious enemies, or just experiment to the limits of your imagination in this expansive simulation!

Craft a new house, build cities, or start a farm. Bring your imagination to life and build your dream world where the possibilities are endless. Adventure through your own online game and play with friends, building from the ground up in our crafting simulation. In Creative mode, enjoy unlimited resources and the freedom of superior building and crafting. In Survival mode, survive the night, face intense battles, craft tools, and fend off danger. With seamless cross-platform and multiplayer gameplay on Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, you can adventure solo or with friends and discover an infinite, randomly generated world filled with blocks to mine, biomes to explore, and mobs to befriend (or battle) in a universe of crafting!

In Minecraft, the world is yours to shape!


BUILD YOUR DREAM WORLD

â€¢ Build a house or create an entire world from the ground up

â€¢ Building games for kids, adults, or anyone

â€¢ Craft and build from special resources and tools to create brand new structures and landscapes

â€¢ Explore an endless open world simulation full of different biomes and creatures

â€¢ Minecraft Marketplace â€“ Get creator-made add-ons, thrilling worlds, and stylish cosmetics on Minecraft Marketplace

â€¢ Private and community servers â€“ Online games allow you to connect with millions of players, or subscribe to Realms Plus to cross-play with up to 10 friends on your own private server

â€¢ Slash commands â€“ Tweak how the game plays: you can change the weather, summon mobs, change the time of day, and more

â€¢ Add-ons â€“ Block builders can customize their experience even further with add-ons as they build up! If you're more tech-inclined, you can modify your game to create new resource packs


MULTIPLAYER ONLINE GAMES

â€¢ Join free massive multiplayer servers and play with thousands of other builders

â€¢ Multiplayer servers allow you to play with up to 4 players online with a free Xbox Live account

â€¢ Explore endless realms. With Realms and Realms Plus, you can play with up to 10 friends cross-platform, anytime, anywhere on Realms, your own private server that we host for you

â€¢ Customize your world with Realms Plus. Get instant access to an extensive catalogue that is refreshed every month! Share with friends on your own private Realms server*

â€¢ MMO servers allow you to connect and play with players across the world, to explore custom worlds, build with friends, and participate in large-scale events

â€¢ Enjoy crafting buildings, building gigantic community-run worlds, competing in unique mini-games, and socializing in lobbies full of fellow Minecraft block builders


SUPPORT: https://www.minecraft.net/help


LEARN MORE: https://www.minecraft.net/


MINIMUM RECOMMENDED SPECIFICATION


To check the requirements for your device visit: https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4409172223501


*Realms & Realms Plus: Try a free 30-day trial in-app.

title: Disney Solitaire
summary:
Welcome to Disney Solitaire, the ultimate solitaire card game that transforms classic tripeaks solitaire into an exciting experience filled with Disney magic!

Play through beautifully designed levels inspired by iconic Disney and Pixar scenes while solving fun and challenging puzzles.

Step into the enchanting realm of Disney Solitaire, where every postcard recreates an iconic scene from the worlds of Disney and Pixar!
From the moment you start playing, youâ€™ll find yourself immersed in colorful scenes featuring some of your favorite characters like Buzz Lightyear, Aladdin, Elsa, and Moana.

This isnâ€™t just another solitaire game; itâ€™s a vibrant experience packed with excitement, strategy, and whimsical charm.
Disney Solitaire redefines the solitaire card games experience with innovative gameplay features. Collect unique power-ups and special cards that can change your strategy.

Play Disney Solitaire now and step into a world where every game leads to magic, and every victory brings you closer to unlocking an enchanting scene. With stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and heartwarming moments, Disney Solitaire is your ticket to a magical escape.
Donâ€™t miss out â€“ your adventure awaits!

ğŸŒŸ Why Disney Solitaire is Perfect for You ğŸŒŸ
If youâ€™re a fan of solitaire card games with a twist, or love exploring the worlds of Disney and Pixar, this game is designed just for you. Solve fun tripeaks solitaire challenges while unlocking Disney-inspired scenes that bring some of your favorite stories to life.
Each level combines the strategy of solitaire games with magical Disney elements to keep you entertained and engaged. Whether you're looking for a relaxing pastime or a chance to test your skills, Disney Solitaire delivers endless fun and excitement.

ğŸ‰ Key Features of Disney Solitaire ğŸ‰
âœ” Innovative Solitaire Gameplay: Play Tripeaks solitaire with exciting power-ups and challenges!
âœ” Beloved Disney Characters: Recreate scenes with fan-favorites like Elsa, Moana, and Simba!
âœ” Collect and Decorate: Unlock beautiful Disney and Pixar- inspired puzzles and postcards.
âœ” Daily Challenges and Events: Donâ€™t miss special events with exclusive rewards to enhance your experience.
âœ” Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Perfect for beginners and experienced players of solitaire games alike.

âœ¨ Join the Magic of Disney Solitaire âœ¨
Embark on a journey filled with whimsy and wonder. Whether youâ€™re revisiting nostalgic Disney classics or discovering something new, Disney Solitaire offers an exciting twist on the solitaire card game you know and love.
Download now to explore iconic Disney and Pixar locations, solve charming Disney puzzles, and enjoy a fresh take on tripeaks solitaire. Let the magic begin!

ğŸ’– Designed for Disney Fans of All Ages ğŸ’–
With its enchanting visuals and simple yet captivating gameplay, Disney Solitaire is perfect for fans of solitaire games, Disney lovers, and puzzle enthusiasts. Take a break from your day and unwind in a world of endless magic!

Start Your Magical Journey Today!
What are you waiting for?
Download Disney Solitaire now and experience the charm of Disney and Pixar like never before. Take on delightful solitaire card games, recreate nostalgic Disney scenes and immerse yourself in the wonder of Disney puzzles.

Disney Solitaire is intended for those 18 and older. Disney Solitaire does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Disney Solitaire may also contain advertising.

You may require an internet connection to play Disney Solitaire and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality,
compatibility and interoperability of Disney Solitaire in the above description and additional app store information.
This game may contain flashing effects that could trigger seizures in sensitive individuals.

title: Gauntlet Idle: AFK RPG
summary:
The evil dragon ruins the garden of the castle where the scary princess lives, and the princess leaves to catch the dragon.
The king leaves the responsibility for the broken garden to the gardener and instructs him to bring the princess..
"Bring the princess; kill her while you're at it."

[Endless growth Action RPG]
Hack-and-slash action RPG to defeat enemies with spectacular skills and actions with an automatic combat system.
You can get legendary equipment and rare items just by waiting.
Easily and quickly level up your heroes, acquire a variety of abilities, and grow in the way you want
Rich gold and various rewards even when offline during adventure!

[The fun of collecting lots of items]
Exploring deeper dungeons by rapidly increasing the hero's fighting power with swords, shields, and accessories
If you strengthen and raise rare equipment, it becomes more powerful equipment and greatly increases combat power!

[Exhilarating Hack'n Slash Battle]
Eliminate bosses by summoning powerful skills to defeat enemies with splendor and exhilaration
Combining swords, equipment, and skills, establishing your own battle strategy to become more powerful!

[In-depth growth and various contents]
Acquiring a variety of avatars used by ancient heroes enables you to explore more dangerous areas with overwhelming power
Challenge dungeons occupied by various bosses and raid content that needs strategic control!

Enjoy your adventure with the best unattended RPG that enables infinite hero growth and makes continuous and diverse collection growth plays easy and easy

[Introducing the access rights]
Mandatory access: None

[Optional access rights]
- Notification (AOS 13 and later): Used for receiving push notifications.
*You can use the service without agreeing to access.

[How to withdraw access rights]
- Operating System 6.0 or higher: Settings > App Manager > App Selection > Permissions > Access can be withdrawn
- Operating System 6.0 or lower: Access rights cannot be withdrawn, can be withdrawn by deleting apps

If you have any suggestions, questions, or problems with the game, please contact the email address below
cs@metaboneent.com

title: Matching Story - Puzzle Games
summary:
Scattered items await your Merge, upgrading them to gardens and castles. Oh! And there are treasure chests everywhere waiting for you to unlock. With your friends, start enjoying yourself together!
Please note! Matching Story is a free game and no Wi-Fi needed.
Test your match-3 skills and craft all kinds of magical items on your wonderful fairytale adventure! On this uncharted island, there lies a piece of barren land, waiting for you to make it glow with dazzling light.
What sorts of miracles will you find? In Matching Story, youâ€™ll solve match-3 puzzles to unlock amazing rewards you can use to spruce up your island and uncover surprises that await you! Explore and upgrade a world full of charming and fantastic floras, gorgeous goodies, and cute critters to choose from. Use them to design and decorate your garden and island!
About match-3 games, Matching Story provides over 3000 levels of different difficulties and gameplay for free. It offers an immersive experience with the stunning effects brought by TNT, various styles of game pieces, and interesting match-3 level designs, ensuring a double gaming experience for both your vision and touch.
In the Matching Story games, you can not only explore the fun of solving puzzles but also gain more resources in a variety of match-3 modes. It allows you to unlock different islands and build your dream garden island through collection and merging. At the same time, you can unlock new story chapters through match gameplay. Starting on a new journey with our protagonist Emma to save, explore, solve puzzles, match, and merge. Come and enjoy the amazing matching experience that Matching Story has to offer.

â— RENOVATE your island as you wish. Your own fantasy island is at your fingertips!
â— EXPLORE exciting stories and unlock lots of mysterious characters!

â— ENJOY the main story and explore the secrets hidden on the fantasy island!
